have in their reviews. remember that if your SHAREING this tv with other laptops/printers/computers/tablets in your home load times for your apps and down loading movies will suffer if more then one is use at the time. also if you are wi-fi house hold there are transmitting and recieving issues along with what was stated above. the world we live in has many thing communicating all around us. i bought a 50 foot cat6 cable and it runs under the floor in my basement.i have no cable or sattelite at the time so all i have is an antenna on my house with a pre-amp ($100). the tv will scan for channels and i got 25 plus one really bad analog signal...i didn't think it was used anymore. the menu was for me very easy to navigate and understand. the remote is a normal remote on one side and if you flip it over there is a key board style lay out of buttons on that side. sweet !The picture is very crisp with 4 sizes to choose from so if your channel is say 720 instead od 1080p you can just hit a button and widen it or zoom to get the pic the way you want it. there are about 10 different preset picture settings: vivid/football/baseball/basketball/movie/.....etc, etc or you can make your own up (custom). if i remember correctly there are 3 differenet sound settings to choos from.last night i tried out the Amazon app because i all ready  had a movie in my list i watched on my computer months ago. you need to have your computer on when you first try this app because your tv gives you a code to register your tv at amazon.com. i went to amazon via the computer and registered my tv in about 10 seconds..easy,easy,easy. sat there and watched my movie last night. took maybe 30-40 seconds to load and buffer in. great picture and sound.my sony blu-ray home theater system i ordered also has the internet hook up feature and apps so i i want to i could also use it to stream movies right to my tv. for me i am getting the NETFLIX subscription in the near future.one other note: while changeing channels for me with an antenna there is a slight delay. say 1-2 seconds. maybe because i don't have sattelite/cable hook-up.NEW NOTE ADDED NOVEMBER 30TH 2012: JUST DELEATED SOME OF MY PREINSTALLED APPS AND FOUND MANY MANY MORE AT THE YAHOO STORE ONLINE. YOUR ALLOWED TO DELETE AND STORE NEW APPS! A LOT ARE FREE. I ADDED EBAY/DARTS (GAME)/TEXAS HOLD EM/YAHOO FANTASY FOOTBALL/ TRIVIA QUESTION /AND A FEW OTHER ONES. KEPT AMAZON AND WEATHER CHANNEL AND A FEW PRE SETS. QUICK AND EASY ONCE YOU FIND IT AND LEARN HOW TO DO IT....THE DART GAME WAS FUN AND EASY...COULD EASILY SEE ME AND MY SON PLAYING IT....TAKES THE WHOLE SCREEN UP !HOPE MY RANTINGS HELP SOMEONE OUT THERE TO MAKE A CHOICE ON WHICH TV TO BUY.....HAVE A GOOD NEW YEAR/X-MAS ALLNEW NOTE ADDED 12-9-2012: DID INCOUNTER ONE HANG-UP. WHILE USING NETFLIX APP AND FINISHING ONE MYTHBUSTER EPEISODE AND GOING TO THE NEXT ONE, THE NEW EPISODE ONLY BUFFERED IN ABOUT %20 AND LOCKED UP. THIS HAS HAPPENED TWICE ON DIFFERNET TV SHOWS. I HAD TO POWER DOWN THE TV TO GET OUT OF IT. EVEN THE POWER SWITCH ON THE SIDE WOULD NOT WORK. IT WAS AS IF THE TV WAS STILL TRYING TO DOWNLOAD THE SHOW. MAYBE I SHOULD HAVE WAITED LONGER BUT AT THE TIME I HAD WAITED ABOUT 4 MINUTES OR SO. THIS COULD ALL BE NETFLIX SIDE OR MAYBE MY OLDER TYPE (WIRED) ROUTER....? DON'T KNOW FOR SURE BUT IT HASN'T HAPPENED FOR AWHILE NOW.Update: March 25 2013 Tv Picture just went out. Had the Tv for 4 months now. Had to contact VIZIO Company Proper to get it fixed. I had 2 options: 1. (quicker) repairman comes to my house and replaces a controller board in the tv....they know about this exact issue  2. BRAND NEW TV DELIVERED RIGHT TO MY DOOR STEP. I chose the repairman since i will be receiving the updated chip in a new controller board and if that doesn't fix it i can always just get a new tv ! Got to love VIZIO  SUPPORT . After getting off the phone from Vizio i have a repair number and 2 emails to confirm they have my Claim. The actual repair company will contact me in 3 buisness days inorder to set up an appointment to come to my house and repair it......Friday is a holiday darn it....pooey. I will update this post after repair.4-2-2013 took 1 1/2 hrs. repairman showed up with a "kit" containing all 3 boards for my tv. after replacing the 2nd board it fired up. the main video board was the problem. the power supply board was NOT replaced. Tv works fine now. Netflix app still malfunctions from time to time but he said it was an app problem not the tv....netflix thing..i agree. i had to work through Vizio because the 90 day Target warranty was over. After 1yr my store (3yr) extended warranty will take over.

Reviews.Title: Great value!
Reviews.Author: DIYer
Reviews.Content: After researching TV's for several weeks, I stumbled onto this set a couple weeks ago and decided to pull the trigger over the Thanksgiving weekend. Beside some some crazy Black Friday pricing at Walmart (which I was too late to capitalize on as we opted not go out on Thanksgiving night and they were obviously sold out when we arrived the next morning), this was the best deal I could find and with no tax and free delivery, it was an easy choice to go with Amazon. After delivery yesterday (which was another great experience as the scheduled time slot was met and made planning easy), I installed the set and spent a hour or so getting everything set up. Overall, I am very impressed with all facets of this TV... great color and sound, along with fairly easy setup. I own several other brand TVs, but this is my first Vizio and will not be my last as you will not find a better value for a 60 inch Smart LED TV!Although I was able to get the internet configured and working via wireless, I am still having issues connecting with a wired connection directly to my router.I also installed a couple rear Polk speakers and attached them to the analog audio output, which adds some nice depth to the sound. But after seeing the recommended Vizio wireless sub/surround speaker set-up in the quick start guide, I may be returning the speakers and just going that route as it will only cost an additional $120 to have a center channel and sub.

Reviews.Title: best thing going
Reviews.Author: enean
Reviews.Content: I picked this tv up on b.f. and i can say this the the best out of all tvs i have ever owned... great price for over the top performance and quality... Vizio has set the bar very high for other tv manufactures...i got a good t.v. at a good price and did not over pay for a "name or brand"

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV
Reviews.Author: M. Dominick
Reviews.Content: My husband and I bought this TV (amazingly) off Amazon during the Cyber Sale for $688. First off, we couldn't believe that we scored this TV for such an amazing deal! We don't make big purchases like this very often, so when we do we make sure to do our research to ensure that we are investing in something that will last and is of good quality. By the reviews on Amazon and description of the TV it sounded like a great choice for the price. Not to mention that my uncle has a Vizio and he really loves it. We got the TV today, it was too cold for the delivery man to test it for us, but when we eventually put it together and plugged it in it worked great! The stand was easy to assemble and feels very sturdy. Since it is a 60 inch TV, the largeness of it makes you wonder if it will fall when you are adjusting the TV to fit on a piece of furniture, but once it is set where you like it on a study piece of furniture it is fine and does not move when you walk, etc. I'll update though if we experience any problems with that. When we turned on the TV it was easy to connect to WiFi. There weren't any problems with setting it up. We ran out to get a HDMI cable so we could get the HD channels through our cable provider. We bought just a 12 dollar one and it worked extremely well!! Totally worth it to watch TV in HD. This TV has a great picture and is clear and crisp in HD. We are so happy that we bought this TV and are looking forward to enjoying it in the future. Thank you, Amazon!!

Reviews.Title: A true bargain.
Reviews.Author: Richard L. Carver
Reviews.Content: This product represents a sea change in big screen value. The Vizio E601-A3 instantly became the standard to beat against the other companies offerings. As you've read in other reviews the picture, the apps. the WIFI are good enough at any price level and are astounding at the sub 1K price point. This TV broke into Amazon's top 100 electronic sellers. amazing for  60" TV.There don't seem to be any fatal flaws to detract from the success of this introduction. Complaints have been limited to basically production vagaries any machine is subject to. I've had mine for a little over a week and have been watching a lot of TV, the only thing I have to report is a lip sync issue on one channel and I will chalk that up to  a transmission problem rather than a fault of the set.There's a great owners thread at the AVSforums with some great practical advice from the AV nerds that can help you get the most from your new TV.[...]I have to run, almost time for FOOTBALL!

Reviews.Title: For people who know....
Reviews.Author: Antonio Oace
Reviews.Content: ....what they are doing.I adjusted my screen settings to perfect specifications and I'd like to share it with you all who want it. Now I've always been a guy to have contrast at full blast and brightness to a level in which I can see black comfortably however this affects the quality significantly and maybe I didn't compose that sentence persuasively but hear me out.Backlight- 100Bright- 50Contrast- 68Color- 60Tint- 0Sharpness- 45Temperature- coolblack detail- offBacklight control- offSmooth motion effect- low or off (this affects quick movements when you're in a game. It causes the screen to buffer/smoothen/blur).Reduce signal noise- low (same as smooth motion effect, trust me, I experimented)Reduce block noise- high.The last three settings are important for what you use our tv for. I use mine for gaming and thus those are the best settings. For tv you should put signal at high and motion at high unless you watch sports but that last statement is all assumption. Everything else is evidence based.Adjust brightness and color above to your satisfaction in your room. Whether it's a bright room or a dark room. I'm in a dark room and these settings work well in the dark.Now to the tricky part. Something that lots of people don't dare touch. The color tuner.Red-saturation- neg 20Red-bright- pos 5Green-saturation- pos 7Green-bright- neg 2Blue-bright- neg 14Cyan-saturation- pos 10Cyan-bright- pos 2Magenta-saturation- pos 4Magenta-bright- neg 14Yellow-hue- neg 10Yellow-saturation- pos 30Yellow-bright- pos 50Again. These are tested numbers and are objective rather than opinion/subjective/preference.The yellow color with a -10 hue is my preference because I* think the yellow is on the green side and I like my yellows rich rather than fluorescent. Note by rich I don't mean gold. I just mean what I believe a perfect yellow is. The other colors (red, green, blue) are based on gamma correction and they are all on the same color brightness spectrum. Meaning one color is not "brighter" than the next.Oh the picture is great haha. Love my tv in my room! One of my best buys ever.10/10 picture10/10 sound10/10 quality6/10 tv stand (flimsy and makes me worry but I know it's not going anywhere but.... You know how it is..)Recommend for everyone who wants a very underrated cheap quality tv.

Reviews.Title: Can't beat it for the price, even for a bit more.
Reviews.Author: Mayer Z
Reviews.Content: Overall, we love this tv. It gives you everything you can possibly want in this price range: size, definition, ok sound, really impressive thinness, tiny bezel, included stand, standard wall mounting holes, smart capabilities, awesome remote, loads of apps and so much more.So, here is my review: you can't get better even within $200 above this one. If I would have much more money, I would look for something that beats this one in the following areas:Lighting consistencyColor saturation (the Vizio is excellent, but no samsung)Better built in soundWeb browser atop web-connectivity

Reviews.Title: Best TV for the Price
Reviews.Author: Dominick
Reviews.Content: Great picture quality, plenty of features, slick look make this the best TV I have purchased. Only thing missing is 3d but considering the price difference between 3d tvs and regular tvs, I can do without the 3d. I would definitely purchase another Vizio tv when it comes time.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Remy Gabriel M Cruzmel
Reviews.Content: Have been using it for the last 6 months. Noticed it switch on by its own couple of times but has been doing good with netflix app. Plays well on Youtube for 20 minutes after which it starts to hang up. Have to restart to get that fixed. But otherwise interface is great with a comfortable keyboard but the letters starts to fade off recently.

Reviews.Title: Sometimes needs a reboot
Reviews.Author: Bryan Becker
Reviews.Content: We love the tv when we bought it last year.  Price was great, love the smart apps.  The only issue we have had, its been about 3 times now in the past 6 months, that the tv is "on" but no picture.  We have it hooked up to a receiver and know its connected properly.  The only fix is unplugging the power cords from the tv, wait 10 seconds, and p-lug it back in and it comes on without issue.  I don't see anywhere to check for firmware updates, I was hoping one would come out to maybe fix this issue.  It's not a big deal though for us.  Would still recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Picture quality is Good
Reviews.Author: Stevie D.
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is good, but the smart TV apps are generally poor. The MLB.tv app does not fully support all of the features and the NetFlix app locks up occaisionally requiring the unit to be powered off in order to reset it. Additionally when when powering off after a lock up, it makes a very loud popping sound. Also, the enter button on the remote fell out after about 2 months of use and was very difficult to repair.

Reviews.Title: Looks great!
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: I sold my older 50" Panasonic plasma with an incredible picture because it was juice hog and replaced it with this model. The picture is great after calibration. I did have a problem with the delivery service, but they eventually got everything sorted out. I'd recommend running a pixel check and calibration immediately since this model did have some panel problems a few years ago. My single gripe would be with the included stand. It is very flimsy and mounted in a way that does not inspire confidence in its support of such a large panel.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, Great Price
Reviews.Author: Mike R.
Reviews.Content: This was my biggest purchase on amazon so far.  I was a little worried about buying a tv online without seeing it in person first, but it has been a great tv. Had it just about a year now and no problems yet.

Reviews.Title: Great Apps, Great Price, Huge TV.
Reviews.Author: IndyTom
Reviews.Content: This thing is way better than my old TV but it was't just because of Vizio being a good brand. They have packed all sorts of features into this TV and it is a super good buy. I am sure this won't be available long since they update devices so often, but while it lasts, its worth a buy.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Jax_Jaguars
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV, Just as good as the Sony Bravia it replaced and I was surprised as I have always just bought Sony Tv's.

Reviews.Title: A good deal !!
Reviews.Author: Randy Swingle
Reviews.Content: Very happy with this TV. First one arrived damaged but they did a good job of sending a replacement. Picture is very good, built-in speakers are fair to midland. I added a Vizio 3.1 Surround system that does a very good job. Great price and 12 months free financing.

Reviews.Title: Great product for the money
Reviews.Author: S. Berry "Berry"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for a friend who was in need of a TV and had a birthday coming up.  He was real happy to get it and watches it every day.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture, Apps and Excellent Customer Service!
Reviews.Author: Virtual Media
Reviews.Content: Excellent picture quality,  Netflix, Amazon, Hulu and Youtube apps work perfectly. TV is thin and light, Chromecast works excellent with TV and creates a excellent duo for Cord Cutters.Update:We had an issue with the TV picture 4 months past the warranty, we did not purchase the extended warranty. I assumed we were screwed, WOW.. was I wrong! I actually got customer support on the phone within minutes on a Friday night. Customer service had told me how to do a hard reset which I had already tried with no luck. I was given a case number and was told to call back on Saturday to speak to a higher level of tech support and customer service.I called Saturday and was talking to a very pleasant and understanding rep within in a few minutes. I was asked to send a Screen Cap of my purchase order from Amazon and call back after confirmation. Just got off the phone and couldn't believe it! Vizio is sending a repairman to my home within 5 days to repair and or replace TV at no additional cost.In all my years I have never received this kind of customer service on any electronic device. I wish I could remember all of the reps names that helped me to thank them for the professional and considerate assistance. I did get the last rep's name. So Casandra and all the others supporting Vizio customers THANK YOU! You have a customer for life-----------------------------------------A very satisfied Vizio customer for life!

Reviews.Title: Sound Loses this TV a 5 star review
Reviews.Author: kenny
Reviews.Content: Great price, great picture.  The sound is not that great, you will need to buy a sound bar or some type of speaker set up.

Reviews.Title: Amazing TV for the Money
Reviews.Author: WS_BHM
Reviews.Content: I got this in the Fall of 2013 for $849.  An amazingly good deal for that price.  I went from 42" to 60" and the difference is more dramatic than I imagined.  It works great for movies and my XBOX.

Reviews.Title: Great Purchase.
Reviews.Author: John Kotz
Reviews.Content: Love this TV. I had a 32 inch Vizio HD before this. I have really enjoyed this 60 in. HDTV for all of the sporting events I watch. I still need to run this through a better sound system than I have. Otherwise, very pleased with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Wifi connectivity issues - awful range
Reviews.Author: beervendor
Reviews.Content: Had problems staying connected to my home network for more than a few days. Would connect fine and stream Netflix without any "buffering" lag, then without warning would drop the connection and be unable to "see" the router's SSID. Would require a "factory setting" reset of the TV once or twice a week. Tech support claimed my router was too far from the TV (separated by 30 feet plus one floor. Other laptops, phones, Roku, etc had no signal problems from even further away.) I moved the router one floor below and directly below the TV and the problem persisted. Using an ethernet cable now. Wifi radio seems like a strange place to skimp on a "Smart TV."Otherwise, picture and other (mostly useless) "smart" apps work fine and picture is impressive. But I'd look elsewhere for an internet-enabled set.

Reviews.Title: You can't be the quality at this price!
Reviews.Author: Robert Smith
Reviews.Content: I got mine from a costco. The quality of picture is awesome! You do need to have a sound bar or external speakers of some sort. That is like saying shoes need laces at this point in tv market but to make sure that is stated. It has sound but not nearly as good as our vizio sound bar!

Reviews.Title: Nice!
Reviews.Author: greg tanner
Reviews.Content: Apps seem a bit clunky but this thing is awesome! It has a great picture from all angles, controls are better than I would have come up with myself, and contrary to some reviews I read the stand is fine. I move it and tilt it playing with wires several times a week, no problem.

Reviews.Title: great tv!
Reviews.Author: alex
Reviews.Content: have had it now for over a year and am very happy with this tv and its lower price than those "best" brands like samsung

Reviews.Title: Inconsistant Picture Quality
Reviews.Author: Andrew J Curran
Reviews.Content: The clarity of the picture is somewhat spotty.Great wehen used for gaming, mostly a TV channel thing.Just was expecting more consistency

Reviews.Title: Love the size and the sleek look
Reviews.Author: Jeanne Stewart
Reviews.Content: Im not very tech savvy and thought I would be able to easily play Pandora on this TV.  Havent figured out how to do that yet.  The apps don't do much for me.  Havent really used any of the SMART features on this TV at all.

Reviews.Title: Read before buying
Reviews.Author: blayne robinson
Reviews.Content: It's tax season and I had been looking for a tv to replace my 50" plasma.  My bedroom tv stopped working about 3 months before hand so I had a choice to make. my wife and I discussed it and came to the conclusion that replacing the old plasma would be the best bet. Now I didn't buy this TV off amazon.  I purchased it from walmart since it was on sale. I initially wanted a 65" Samsung but they had just changed out their tvs.This tv was less expensive and had the options I was looking for. 4 HDMI and a nice picture. Over all the price was right.I was excited to get this tv home and get it set up. I had sone other things to do that day so I hooked it up turned it on and set it up. I walked out the door not to get home until around 9 at nite.Boy was I surprise when I turned it back on to a bad popping sound. I couldn't turn up the volume or change input.  I turned it off again and POP. Turned it back on and POP. I could turn the volume up or access settings for around 15 seconds.  At which everything because useless.Now most people would have loaded it up and ran back to the store but the tv was to large for my car so I had to wait almost a week to return it. The picture quality was excellent but, and the tv speaker's sounded good. But I muted it and used my stereo instead.I then looked this model up and it had been recalled back in April of 2013. I found several people complain about the same thing. Vizio sent techs out and fixed the ones that people didn't want to exchange.Today, after the snow storms in the south shut us down for almost a week, I was able to return it. I was going to exchange it for the same model when my buddy asked if I was sure I wanted to get the same thing after all I have read.In the end I decided to get a Samsung for few more hundred and am very happy. It might not be a smart TV but I didn't need one in the first place since I have an xbox one and ps3.Would I recommend this tv? Honestly I have owned 3 other vizio and this is my first issue. Based on other reviews this tv has issues.  The interface is outdated but if you are looking for a tv and on a budget and willing to risk it. This is a good tv for the price.

Reviews.Title: A great value for the money.
Reviews.Author: James M. Hare
Reviews.Content: Pros - very good color, IMO, easy to set up, many 'tweaks' for display colors, great value for the money, lots of inputs.Cons - tinny sound, (just like every other flat screen).I bought this set to replace a 12-year old Panny projection tv that lost it's mind. I did a lot of research, and, trusting the Amazon reviews that seemed intelligently-written, pulled the trigger on this nice big Vizio.  My local Walmart online said they had it in stock, but when I got there and asked the kid about it, he claimed not to have any in back. He seemed more interested in selling a teenage girl a new iPhone, so I got back in my car and drove 20 miles to another state to a BJs Club to get it instead.  Same price, no sales tax.Got it home, out of the box, plugged it in, and set it up according to most of the reviews and instructions I'd seen - turn off the "In-Store" mode.  I have Verizon Fios and it usually delivers a decent picture and sound. I'm not an anal-retentive video/audiophile who whines about how much black separation there is in the shadows behind someone's chair in "Matrix Reloaded" or something, I just want blue sky, green grass and yellow...I don't know, corn, I guess.This set has FOUR HDMI inputs, which are currently the best way to deliver video and audio. There are also the YGB component (next best) and standard RCA inputs as well, and a bunch of others that you might need, depending on what you hook up. Something for everyone here, no worries.The Viz delivers a picture that is at least the equal of many sets costing $1500, half again as much as you'll pay for the Vizio.  Is it as good as a $5000 Sony? Not sure. But for me, the picture quality is much improved over the Panny, and, according to most reviews, stellar for a sub-$1000 set.There are a bunch of presets for various types of display, such as MOVIE, GAME, and various sports - FOOTBALL, GOLF, etc etc.  Since this is so personal, I'm not gonna tell you which is best for you, or even which one I use. Suffice to say that there are a lot of possible adjustments to various color, brightness, and contrast settings, and you'll just have to tweak it to your own satisfaction. This is no different from what you would do with ANY set, so it's not something worth getting worked up about.  Some  people just set it to MOVIE mode and forget it.The remote is simple to use, although I trained my Fios remote to mimic it for channel and volume settings, so I only need one remote. You only need the Vizio remote to make adjustments to the colors, and to use the 'smart' functions - Netflix, and such.The wireless internet connectivity was pretty simple to use, it announced itself and my router found it and all was right with the world.  We occasionally watch YouTube junk on it but other than that I'm not a big user of these features. They all work, and they're simple enough to use if you want them.Here are the 'downsides', if you can call them that. They're really the only negatives I can come up with after nearly six months with the set.1. The sound is pretty bad. ALL flat TVs suffer from this, you just can't put good speakers in a case only an inch thick. So I knew this going in, and have purchased the 42" Visio4251w-B4  5.1 sound bar recently, which is a MUST-HAVE addition.2. I have a Blue-ray player HDMI'ed into one of the FOUR HDMI inputs, and when you put a DVD in, the TV automatically switches to that input, but it can not automatically switch back to the cable box's HDMI input when you're done with the DVD player.  So you need to grab the Vizio remote and switch inputs.  Not a deal killer by any means, but a minor annoyance.Other than those two minor little things, this set is a great value for a 60" HDTV. The 'black screen of death' problems that were mentioned by several reviews back in the mid-2012 to mid-2013 time frame have been FIXED by Vizio, and from all reports, all sets built since about mid June 2013 are fine.  So don't worry about it.One word of warning - there are lots of blandishments to get an extended warranty for the set from SquareTrade, and others.  I originally did, after asking the SquareTrade CSR whether their warranty kicked in after the Vizio 1-year warranty, and being told it did. Then when I got the paperwork, it was clear I'd been misled - the Square Trade warranty OVERLAPPED the Visio for the first year, so you pay for three years but only get two. I cancelled mine, and they did return my premium.  The manufacturer warranty is one year, 100% parts and labor for anything, so you can't go wrong there.  Make sure if you get an 'extended' warranty, from any source, that it kicks in AFTER the manufacturer warranty ends. There is no reason to get double coverage.

Reviews.Title: I love this television ... and I have it on my wall.
Reviews.Author: John Chamberlain
Reviews.Content: Had a problem after three months. The manufacturer replaced it ... Brought the new, took down the one that was only three months, and installed the second new one.  I am perfectly happy with Vizio. And bought at a great price.

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: bobpride
Reviews.Content: Paid $850, priced challenged and got $50 credit.  Great TV, use  Netflix and Amazon Prime.  Interfaces are kinda lame --- search is not easy like on PS3.  Could be me.  Cannot figure out how to access a browser and surf using the TV display.

Reviews.Title: very nice....well worth the purchase.
Reviews.Author: Anthony B. David
Reviews.Content: features, quality, and the price for this product was well worth the wait.  i've waited a year to decide my LCD upgrade purchase.  bought the item during Cyber Monday and i thought this was a great deal.

Reviews.Title: Had this about 3 months
Reviews.Author: Bob0a
Reviews.Content: Easy to install, good picture, and does all the things I bought it for. The remote is a plus in that there is a QUERTY keyboard on the back. I use Google video and the set connects to it without any problem.

Reviews.Title: Great...while it lasted
Reviews.Author: J. Wakley "fox hat"
Reviews.Content: The picture was great and I had no issues with the TV until about 3 days after I got it when it died.  I turned it off and when I went to turn it back on again I got nothing, just a black screen.  I called Vizio support and they had me try a few things that didn't work then they wanted to start the process of returning it.  I bought it from Amazon so I decided to return it through them.  As always the Amazon customer service was amazing and I had a new 60" Sharp Aquos on the way to me the same day I called.  The only problem was the Vizio died during the holidays so I missed a bunch of the college bowl games.

Reviews.Title: The clearest picture ever
Reviews.Author: Vtone357 "vtone357"
Reviews.Content: You will not believe the out of the box clarity of this television. Even movies have that "live action" quality. I would have given it 5 stars but I refrained because there is 1 design flaw, the  remote sensor requires is acutely insensitive. You literally have to point the remote directly at the small sensor, unlike any other tv I've had before. (I also have the same problem with the vizio 3d television I purchased around the same time). This is a great TV for a great price.

Reviews.Title: Whoa! This is one big TV
Reviews.Author: Rainer Mueller "raynardo"
Reviews.Content: I wanted a big TV for my new man cave so I went hunting. I discovered that this is one of highest rated LED Smart HDTV's, and Amazon's price was amazing. Best of all they hired a company to deliver it who came to my house, unpacked it, and set it up, and then took away the cardboard box and also volunteered to take my old 42" plasma screen.This is my second Vizio Smart HDTV, my other one is in the living room, so I knew that Vizio makes a quality product at an affordable price. I wasn't disappointed. My wife will even leave the living room to watch movies in my man cave (I guess it's alright to allow wives into your man cave, but only occasionally!). It's better than a movie theater experience.I received this unit delivered to my home in just 4 days.

Reviews.Title: Texas
Reviews.Author: June "chilli"
Reviews.Content: Great tv and very user friendly for the price.  I should have bought a 240 Hz but this was the one that had a bigger bang for your buck during Christmas time.

Reviews.Title: Great TV - Great Value
Reviews.Author: Wyatt Shaw "Wyatt"
Reviews.Content: Overview:- purchased this TV for daily television watching - sports, cartoons, movies - a little bit of everything.  This is our kitchen/living room and gets the most average usage.Pros:- great picture quality: a while back I purchased a plasma tv that cost three times as much as this tv - i'm having a hard time telling the difference- the black is really black: which is an indicator of broad and deep the spectrum of color is on this tv - no shadowing or light edges when there is a black screen - it is truly and evenly black- good sound for a tv: we don't have any additional audio connected to this tv and it does quite will on it's own insofar as I have not felt obligated to augment the audio with an external system (note: we generally do not watch movies other than kids movies on this tv)Cons:- none to speak ofObservations:- i have not used the tv viewing apps that come with the tv (netflix, amazon prime, etc.) - i use a Roku

Reviews.Title: Clear'st picture
Reviews.Author: Paul J Roberts
Reviews.Content: It's the clear'st picture I have ever seen, I'am glad that I got the 60'' LED Smart TV. I'ts just great. I wish my 46" was this clear and crisp.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Joseph Ruiz
Reviews.Content: Great tv!!!! It looks So nice! The visual is amazing! Love all the apps on it, very easy to set up in the living room, it's a little leggy at times though

Reviews.Title: Led Smart Hdtv
Reviews.Author: Judy
Reviews.Content: We were really happy that we upgraded to  a larger tv.  It is very clear and we feel like we are sitting at the theatre.

Reviews.Title: Boo-Yah
Reviews.Author: T. Ten Broeck "Kang 17"
Reviews.Content: Easy transaction and quick - as well as safely packed - shipping.Nice TV. All the features I need without being overwhelmed.Of course, that stuff is there if I feel like going through, but you don't have to if you don't want to.It's pretty much plug and play!

Reviews.Title: Fabulous TV for the money.
Reviews.Author: Lauren Braren
Reviews.Content: This television is an excellent buy.  Great picture and no problems.  Very good service getting it set up too... we are happy with our purchase

Reviews.Title: Excellent value!
Reviews.Author: Luke
Reviews.Content: I used this television for one year before selling it due to a move; despite it's relatively light weight, the box was too large to fit in my car.  If that weren't a concern, I would happily have kept it; this Vizio represents arguably the best value in large TVs.PROS:-Excellent picture quality for an LCD display once calibrated; you won't do much better without investing significantly more money-Very slim and attractive bezel-Good motion-smoothing effect with interpolation enabled-Very low input lag with interpolation disabled -> GREAT FOR CONSOLE GAMINGCONS:-Poor integrated speakers (in fairness, I've never heard integrated speakers that sound good)Make sure to check CNET's review for calibration settings, and enjoy!

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV and a great price!!
Reviews.Author: MrDPinks
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV when it was around $800 and wish I had bought another! This TV is even thinner than I expected and surprising light weight for a 60" TV. The picture is amazing and the Smart TV functionality is great. I am just waiting for the price to drop again to buy another one.

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Bogie
Reviews.Content: It's easy to get bogged down in all of the newest HD tv specs. In the end I got the biggest I could afford from a brand I felt comfortable with. Good decision!

Reviews.Title: The picture is quite nice, but the sound is not rich enough. Needs pair with a 40' over sound bar.
Reviews.Author: xianmin Menchaca
Reviews.Content: The picture is quite nice, but the sound is not rich enough. Needs pair with a 40' over sound bar.

Reviews.Title: Nice  But...
Reviews.Author: James A. Irwin
Reviews.Content: Screen is very much more reflective than was our older 37 in 60hz 720i Vizio.Sound is disappointing.Picture is great, of course.WiFi has caused yet uncorrected recurring losses of WiFi connection to our home computer.Very strange and somewhat disappointing overall.Shipping was very frustrating. We were given srrival times which were later changed w/o notice and we wasted most of two days waiting for delivery that never came. Unconscionable!

Reviews.Title: An Excellent Flat Screen Value
Reviews.Author: Richard E. Miller
Reviews.Content: I like everything about this Vizio after setting the picture mode to 'vivid' from 'standard' (as shipped), or any of the other modes offered. The vivid mode offers more 'pop' or life to all venues.Another tip: Be very carefull when copying the Vizio Users Manual from their on-line site. Midway through the 60 some page manual, actually at page 45, it hung up my printer. I got a "printer spooler error" (software) indication. Had to go to my Tools menu, and turn the spooler back on. I have yet to try to print page 45 and up. I believe Vizio has a software program problem.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the money.
Reviews.Author: iPhone_user
Reviews.Content: Picture quality is excellent. Sound is good, can be improved with a sound bar, I suppose. Apps content is standard, though there is no web browser included.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: William J Myers
Reviews.Content: This TV is a great buy for the enthusiast who wants a quality picture for the price. Easy to use and fun to watch. Recommend getting the Vizio 5.1 Soundbar Surround sound as well to round out the experience. Delivery was quick and the TV was in perfect condition, nothing to complain about.

Reviews.Title: Big!
Reviews.Author: James Siegrist "Disturbedguru"
Reviews.Content: This TV is huge… I honestly did not realize how big 60 inches was but woah. It works as it should, I use with my surround sound and watching sports games or movies is awesome. You can go bigger but for me 70 inches would have been ridiculous. I am happy and it was delivered with no damage and not left on my front porch or anything so I was super happy with that, just all around happy with this TV

Reviews.Title: very satisfied
Reviews.Author: Ellis Paul Batchelder
Reviews.Content: the cable in port could be pointed out instead of down for easer access but other than that a very good pic and buy for the money.  very satisfied

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: gamaven
Reviews.Content: I've had this TV for five weeks and like it a lot.  It's my first LED so my only bases for comparison are what I see in stores or in other peoples' homes and what others say about their experience.  Comapared to my 42" LCD HD TV it starts up quicker and the smaller remote control is also simplr, but quite functional.  Picture quality is not as eye-popping as some other brands in the stores but that might be due to my incorrect calibration settings.  Even so, it is quite good enough for my taste.  The TV meets all of my needs and expectations -- and for a great price.

Reviews.Title: Vizio 60 inch
Reviews.Author: Robert L Allen
Reviews.Content: Very easy to set up and install. The picture is excellant.I would recommend this to anyone seaching for a new TV.

Reviews.Title: Our Smart TV is the best Christmas gift ever !
Reviews.Author: Pam Lewis
Reviews.Content: My new TV is God sent...  It's brought so much JOY into our home.  My family & I spend so much family time together watching. The Beauty of the picture this TV projects has our family in awes! When watching football games you feel you are on the field you can literally see the grass moving! We are like, "WOW"!

Reviews.Title: Fantastic TV!!
Reviews.Author: Page Taylor
Reviews.Content: I think this is one of the best TV's that I have EVER seen! Beautiful picture!! Would recommend to everyone!!

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for.
Reviews.Author: Andrew J. Graber
Reviews.Content: Amazon Instant Video is really iffy when loading. Have to reload it a lot when loading movies. No screensaver for Netflix means if you fall asleep the same image stays displayed all night. Remote is cheaply made.

Reviews.Title: Vizio
Reviews.Author: Lisa Carr
Reviews.Content: Got this 60inch for my husband for Christmas. I the picture, the sound. Vizio products are becoming my families favorite products. Good quality!! Love it

Reviews.Title: Great Product for $798
Reviews.Author: Emre
Reviews.Content: Received this item few days ago and loving it so far!- Great picture quality- Enormous size- Remote with full keyboard

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: Glenn A
Reviews.Content: I researched the large screen LED's and found, for the money, Vizio was the best buy. Amazon's pricing made it an even better deal, especially considering the $897.00 with 24 month interest free financing and free shipping. Delivery was ahead  of schedule and was handled in an excellent manner, setting up the TV to ensure it was working. We are very pleased with the TV's performance. The picture quality is excellent and audio is better than expected. We will add surround sound to improve the audio, but, as is, it is acceptable.

Reviews.Title: Better than expected
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Vizio's name has been getting more and more respect the past couple of years, and offering quality products such as this is why.  I've had the TV for just under a month now and there are no dead pixels, the picture is remarkable, and the built-in wifi works great.  Overall very, very happy with this TV.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: aspuhead "APSUHead"
Reviews.Content: Love my new TV. Got this on Amazon for $688 before it went on sale at WalMart before BF. Saved me the hassle of WalMart and saved me the tax money. Delivered by Amazon and they brought the TV up to my bonus room and unboxed and tested the TV for me. I mounted it using the Cheetah Mounts. Screen is awesome and picture is very clear. When screen is all black, there is some clouding … but no big deal. Got a cheap optical audio cable to run sound back to my surround system which works great. The surround sound and TV sound is a little off when I run audio from Blu Ray or my Dish receiver. I just mute the TV when I have this problem. I keep having trouble streaming Netflix … not sure what the problem is. It works fine some days, and won't connect on other times. That is my only complaint. Overall, super TV for the BF price. I am very pleased with my new set up.

Reviews.Title: Vizio makes an excellent TV
Reviews.Author: MovingTarget "referee5038"
Reviews.Content: Got this TV deliveries tonight. Very nice. We have 4 Vizio LED TV's and they all work great.Very clear, slim, great sound, easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Met expectations
Reviews.Author: Linlou
Reviews.Content: TV size is just right for our area, the color is great and the picture is sharp. This is our third Vizio TV.

Reviews.Title: Great LED TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Big D
Reviews.Content: Arrived as scheduled and looks great, the VIZIO looks as good if not better than all the other brands but over $200 less.  The set up was a breeze and I saved enough to buy an articulating wall mount as well.  I am looking for a switch box so I can attach more than one component but other than that it is perfect.

Reviews.Title: Good TV, some ARC tips
Reviews.Author: Most mileage getter
Reviews.Content: Appears to be a very decent TV, extremely affordable (got it during BF 2013 for ~$700).There are some illumination defects, but nothing too noticeable. And for the price, cannot really complain.When setting up ARC from HDMI1 port on Vizio to my Onkyo 5.1 sound system (HT-R380), I could not figure out at first why I was not getting any Onkyo sound despite what seemed to be the correct configuration on both devices. It turned out that the Bluray player connected to Onkyo was coming through to the TV, and blocking the proper handshake. I unplugged the offending device from Onkyo's HDMI port, and then the TV detected Onkyo properly and started sending the sound. Then I plugged Bluray back, and things appear to be working for now, with Dolby sound being sent to Onkyo via ARC.

Reviews.Title: Excellent quality TV for the average viewer (me)
Reviews.Author: Michael Flint
Reviews.Content: We've cut the cable and gone digital.  My content is Netflix, Hulu, BLU-Ray and iTunes via Apple TV.  This TV has plenty of eye popping color, once tuned for your environment.  Maybe the sound is a little lacking...but it works for now until I get around to hooking up my 5.1 system (looking for more good deals, Amazon).  I bought the 60" at the low black-Friday price.  Its easily worth either that or the pre-sale price.  I went to a competitor brick and mortar and looked at the $2K TVs.  Honestly, I can't tell the difference.  LED really helps the blacks be a little blacker, and the power consumption is a whole lot lower.  It has 4...not 2...HDMI connectors, and you can connect your Wii to this TV.  This 60" is plenty large, and much bigger than my old 42".But what do I know, I'm probably just an average TV watcher, and I don't review anything for a living.  So, really, all I can say is this one works for me.  You might decide to give it a try to.  My basement now feels like the theatre room I was going for....

Reviews.Title: very happy
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Good value for this size tv. The picture is very good, setup was easy with the red carpet service. I am completely happy with this purchase. Of course it would have been better if I had bought it when the price was $100.00 lower!

Reviews.Title: Would buy again 10 out of 10 times!
Reviews.Author: Pedro from Gilbert
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love this TV!  We went from a 42" to this 60", and the difference is huge.  Looks great mounted on my wall.  Would have given it 5 stars if it had a web browser.  Well worth the money, especially if you can get it for $688, as I did during Black Friday!

Reviews.Title: The best bang for you buck out there.
Reviews.Author: David D. "David"
Reviews.Content: This TV is out of site, I love everything about it.  The picture just jumps out at you and set up was a snap.  For the price and quality, you can't go wrong with Vizio.

Reviews.Title: Best Price in it's class
Reviews.Author: Delon
Reviews.Content: For the price this is the best T.V. around hands down. Vizio is an awesome company. You can not beat the quality to price  comparison that Vizio offers.

Reviews.Title: Easy to setup, easy to access Amazon content on line.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "bjkrebel"
Reviews.Content: Great picture, easy to set up.  Easy access to Amazon and other on line content providers through wifi.  Delivery was as scheduled, and very professional.

Reviews.Title: Love love
Reviews.Author: Kara
Reviews.Content: I finally bought a big tv. I am a 39 year old female and this TV is awesome. Get it!

Reviews.Title: Incredible picture lots of great internet apps!
Reviews.Author: Rich Snell
Reviews.Content: This tv went into our new game/workout room. What a great picture features and price. Amazon delivery was earlier than expected...bonus and the delivery guys were polite and friendly overall great experience. We will be buying more as  TVs in the house get older and need replacement. Thanks Amazon and Vizio you are awesome.

Reviews.Title: Good TV for the money.
Reviews.Author: Ted
Reviews.Content: For the money, this TV has a very good picture, but the speakers kind of suck (I have found that to be the case with many of these new thin TV's).  I purchased a Vizio 2.1 42" Soundbar and that solved the sound problems.  A good purchase.

Reviews.Title: Vizio E601i-A3 60-inch LED smart TV review
Reviews.Author: Brian Hund
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent TV with an excellent picture. For the price you just can't beat it. This TV has very easy access to the outputs that are in the rear. It comes with a remote that is easy to use and understand. If anyone is looking for an inexpensive, yet high quality LED TV, With this Vizio you just can not go wrong!

Reviews.Title: Great Picture
Reviews.Author: Billy
Reviews.Content: This TV has a great picture and is very easily used. The thin profile on it gives it a great fit on the wall. This is my first Vizio. All the other TV's I had purchased were Samsungs. I would defiantly buy Vizio again. For the price you can't beat it.

Reviews.Title: Vizio E601i-A3 60 in tv
Reviews.Author: David Leavy
Reviews.Content: I Have had this TV about three weeks so for it is performing the only thing I think could be improve is the sound.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Ulysses F.Tyler
Reviews.Content: I have wanted to get a big screen HDTV for the longest and finally settled on the Vizio 60". The TV has a great picture. I like the apps that the TV has. I don't need hundreds of apps like other TV's as I will us my TV for is watching movies, not checking out facebook on searching online. Awesome TV.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture, Great TV
Reviews.Author: Ajones86
Reviews.Content: I've had this tv for about a month and a half, it has been nothing but great. The picture is awesome, and i have plenty of HDMI inputs for all of my stuff. Love the VGA and audio inputs too.

Reviews.Title: Great deal!
Reviews.Author: benjamin eli lauer
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this TV to family and friends. Football, movies, and video games all look great on this monster screen.

Reviews.Title: shipment and product
Reviews.Author: coxengr
Reviews.Content: the tv was delivered with a professional delivery company. they checked it out for me and gave me opportunity to see the product. I installed it on the new wall mount and was easy to start up and use. replacing the 36 inch hdtv.

Reviews.Title: Tv picture is great, love the built in features
Reviews.Author: Mindi L. Coleman
Reviews.Content: Awesome tv for the price.  The picture is great, and the built in programs like netflix/hulu are a great addition, very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!
Reviews.Author: Jeff Maestas
Reviews.Content: Great tv for the price! No complains, i love how thin and sleek it is. I will recommend it to all my friends.

Reviews.Title: i  have roko  hooked in plus computer works great
Reviews.Author: yardman
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up super picture exclnt. Sound it has a good  set up program you have the sound eqlizer and picture mode adjustments

Reviews.Title: I NOW know what the difference is between rear projection and LED!!
Reviews.Author: Duante Barnett
Reviews.Content: I can see the plankton, grains of salt and texture of all the animals as i watched a show called MicroPlanet! I could see the snails EYES and the HEART BEAT fluttering on the ghost shrimp. The picture is amazing and for a price of $899 I cannot complain!!!

Reviews.Title: As good as it gets!
Reviews.Author: Kris Aune "kaune2003"
Reviews.Content: What a beautiful TV!  It is huge, crystal clear, bright colors, user friendly, has every feature you want, is easy to set up and customize, is incredibly thin, and can be moved by one person. It has plenty of connections, WiFi performs great, and the remote is very convenient with the built in keyboard. On top of all of that the price is a bargain! And the delivery service was friendly, prompt, professional, and the TV arrived in perfect condition. What more could you ask for? I am SO happy!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Tina Marie Paredes
Reviews.Content: We really are enjoying our smart TV.  This was a great purchase...picture is great, size amazing!  I highly recommend this Vizio.

Reviews.Title: Impressed
Reviews.Author: Ray Y. Thompson
Reviews.Content: I am impressed with the look, features, slimness, picture and value of this TV.  The 60 inch size is perfect - not gaudy.

Reviews.Title: So far, This is great
Reviews.Author: Donald
Reviews.Content: Only a couple of weeks with this tv  so far, but it is a great step up from my 42 inch plasma.  Picture is fine and sound is better than I expected, quite satisfactory for most viewing (although the tv is also connected to a stereo receiver and speakers for a better dvd experience).  I have read of problems but no signs of any yet, and the price was first rate.  As others have suggested, I recommend seeking out reviews that offer better picture settings than out-of-the box.  Using them, the picture is terrific.  I do not miss the plasma at all.

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased with TV
Reviews.Author: Mike K
Reviews.Content: I was pleased with the delivery company (CEVA) the TV arrived in perfect shape. The setup was "short and sweet"; the most time consuming step was entering my pre-selected key to access my wireless router. I was impressed with the quality of the picture and sound with the default out of the box factory settings. The internet streaming feature works OK (I'm used to the ROKU which is "high class" compared to the Vizio built-in streaming feature). I mounted this TV on the wall with a Cheetah Mounts APSAMB 32-65" LCD TV full motion Wall Mount Bracket - this mounting bracket works well. The mount enables me to pivot the TV out from the wall at the proper angle for me to watch TV when I'm using the treadmill in a corner.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic TV for the money
Reviews.Author: A.J.
Reviews.Content: I give it 4 stars only because of the edge lit LED's I've seen this one has a pretty bad halo effect when the screen goes black. It's pretty distracting. Overall, the features and picture are great for the money. I was a little hesitant to buy "Used-Like New" from Wholesale Amarillo because they mainly sell rugs, but the TV came in the original box and still had all the stickers on it. I was also slightly nervous because of the bad chips that some of these had. I contacted Vizio and mine was made 20,000 units passed the bad chip run. I have to say that I love the auto update feature. When connected to wifi it auto updates the firmware while the TV is off. Unless you've got money to blow, this TV is great solution for those wanting to stay under $1k.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: JMO
Reviews.Content: I love that the TV is very slim.  Even though I don't have cable or dish (only an HD antenna) , the picture quality on most channels is very clear.  The couple negatives are: 1. The TV does not seem completely steady on the stand, it moves slightly. 2. It also doesn't swivel at all.  The TV is probably better fit to mount on a wall.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Michael A. Tugg
Reviews.Content: I've had the TV for a month and haven't had any problems. Combine that with a solid picture and ease of use, and I have no reasons to give it anything but 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Great Smart TV for the money
Reviews.Author: Amy Subramanian
Reviews.Content: Our 55 inch Vizio TV got stolen from our house and so we were in the market for another TV. Saw this 60 inch TV with so many great features and with our favorable experience with the previous Vizio TV, we got this TV from Amazon.Pros:Picture quality is great at a 180 degree angle.Has a ton of apps though I confess I only used Amazon Prime, YouTube and Netflix.Very thin.Cons:Sound quality is not that great. We use surround sound system and so didn't worry too much about this.Picture quality degrades at an angle, which was worse than our previous TV.The stand is very narrow so I worry whenever our cat jumps on the TV stand that he would be able to tip the TV over. Maybe I'm a bit paranoid.The smart TV apps are not very intuitive. The Amazon Prime movies app is a pain to use.Overall a great TV for the price and would definitely recommend it to budget conscious buyers.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Sam Dagit
Reviews.Content: Very nice TV! It is huge and very clear picture. Awesome purchase. Highly recommended if you are looking to get a big smart TV.

Reviews.Title: top heavy for the factory stand
Reviews.Author: John M. Harper
Reviews.Content: The TV seems to work great, the factory stand seems very unstable.  The height and weight of this 60 inch TV makes it top heavy on the stand.  I am concerned that my grandchildren may touch it up high and cause it to fall over and break.  Vizio has improved their remote control in the past few years.  This remote is of a much better quality than my last vizio TV.  If buying again, would probably consider a Samsung to compare it too.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good
Reviews.Author: Bob
Reviews.Content: About as good as it gets with a 60 inch.  Setup is difficult, particularly for older people who were not born in "the electronic age."

Reviews.Title: Great Picture / wi-fi unstable at timses
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: this is my 3rd Vizio and 2nd with wi-fi.  the 40something inch Vizio has a much more stable wi-fi connection for some reason and it's further away.  The 60" has trouble connecting sometimes, especially to Netflix - which I recommend getting since your one account can run movies on all your Vizio TV's and your i-pad or tablet computer or phone.  Great picture and BIG picture.  Very clean and easy to set up.  Love the Vizio products - have had the other 2 for 2+ years now - knock on wood - all is good. If wi-fi was better on this unit - I'd give it 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Lock Up Problem
Reviews.Author: Scott
Reviews.Content: After waiting a long time for the price to come down and doing a lot of research, I finally purchased this TV for our giant family room and it has worked great for the most part. Set up was very simple, but it only has one old time coaxial cable input for the old timers out there that still have a number of products that need these connections. The smart apps work fine and are a real treat; however, I have found that the Netflix app freezes on a consistent basis. I purchased this TV back in April of 2013 and did not see any mention of this problem then. After coming back to Amazon for some other items, I have noticed a number of posts about this problem but nothing about fixes. Usually, the program will freeze around 9:30 at night. It happens at other times; however, 9:30 seems to be the most consistent. I usually have to unplug the power cord from the back of the TV and usually get a loud bang from the speakers when I do. I plug the power cord back in after a couple of seconds and then it usually boots up fine and I can go back to normal viewing the rest of the night. This does not seem to happen when I use another device like the Wii to access the web, but it always happens when I go through the smart apps on the VIZIO. I have not called VIZIO tech support yet to see if they can help, but that is my next step. Does anyone have any other suggestions? Other than this problem, the TV is great for the picture, sound, price and features. I would definitely recommend it if they have a fix for this problem.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Robert Felcher
Reviews.Content: Great TV.  Clear as a bell picture!! Recommend to everyone....  Best buy I've made in a long time...  good quality..

Reviews.Title: Pretty Good
Reviews.Author: D
Reviews.Content: So far so good. Havent tried all of the featuresof it yet...but everything seems like it will be on point

Reviews.Title: Great TV for what they give you
Reviews.Author: Swanee
Reviews.Content: I like having a TV that runs all of my favorite video apps, without having any devices (like an AppleTV or Roku) attached.  The only downside of this TV is, I periodically have to reset my wireless router to get the TV to connect to wireless.  I've looked all over the place online and couldn't find anything.  My router is only two years old and is fully up to date.  My TV is also fully up to date.  Other than that, I'm happy with the TV.

Reviews.Title: Nice tv
Reviews.Author: Joel Padgett
Reviews.Content: Works great.  Picture is beautiful!  The Netflix option is wonderful. I hope to have this tv for years to come.

Reviews.Title: Good product, good value
Reviews.Author: Cary Preston
Reviews.Content: Picture quality is excellent, and the form is nice- very slim with a surprisingly small border around the image. The smart TV functions are decent, but the interface feels dated. It's functional, but if you have other means of watching Netflix or the other streaming services built into the TV they will likely work better.

Reviews.Title: Wow !
Reviews.Author: Ed Marks
Reviews.Content: Easy setup, connected to Time Warner cable and off we went. We use the Netflix application all the time and it's easy because their is a key (button) right on top of the remote control. The picture quality is awesome. Sometimes pictures of newscasters or celebrities almost seem animated because of the clarity.

Reviews.Title: Great LED Samrt TV
Reviews.Author: Pelicanpat
Reviews.Content: Great picture, Love having the smart TV, arrived Very fast! Led is the way to go and 60" like being in the theater!

Reviews.Title: Cost-effective
Reviews.Author: Crispin Cowan
Reviews.Content: Nice 60" LED active back-lit TV, has smart apps including Amazon streaming, built-in wifi, and the cheapest available at $1000. Does the job nicely.Oddly, its image does not quite pop as much as my other Vizio M470NV 47" TV. Perhaps this is because they are the same 1080P resolution and therefore the 60" has lower pixel density, but it is just not quite as impressive.--------------Update: i discovered that the "not so impressive" image quality was the result of a bad setting in the TiVo I have connected to the Vizio, resulting in a mushed image. Correcting that setting restored the expected sharpness in a 1080P image.

Reviews.Title: great value!!!!
Reviews.Author: bagleynut
Reviews.Content: great tv for the money. works really nice and is easy to setup right from the start. the delivery was the great part.we have not had service that good!!!!! ever!!!! i thing if they could have floated the tv into the house on a cloud---they would have!! service was very good. highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Reliability Trouble
Reviews.Author: Gary Genge
Reviews.Content: I have had three units already since Christmas 2012.  The first unit was replaced due to a problem where the picture quit displaying.  Then the new warranty unit that was sent out had a red line show up in the picture within a month or so.  Third unit acts odd at times (totally hangs up and will only unfreeze if you unplug the set, or pops loudly when you turn it off occasionally).  However, when operating correctly, I have been really pleased with this unit. It has a good picture quality, and decent sound for a slim line TV.

Reviews.Title: We love it !!!
Reviews.Author: Loveamazon
Reviews.Content: This TV is exactly what we were looking for. We really just wanted it for size, but the apps are very nice and we use them often. The Netflix and Youtube apps are the ones we use most and they work great for us. We only had the TV for a month so I can't speak on longevity yet, but the picture is nice and we are happy with our purchase. I did purchase the extra 4 year warranty for protection just in case we encounter any problems . Don't be afraid to buy this.

Reviews.Title: Great value - some bugs
Reviews.Author: Nathan Hodge
Reviews.Content: We purchased this tv (not from Amazon) around Black Friday 2012. For the price it's a great unit.Pros-PricePicture qualityWifiSmart AppsSeparate volume memory per inputCons-Locks up occasionally and takes a few minutes to resetSometimes it locks up so bad you have to pull the power from the unit (not easy when it is wall mounted inside a hole in the wall)Amazon Instant Video interface is awful (not really Vizio's fault as they use the Yahoo Apps platform)We are actually on our second unit. The first one had to be replaced as the screen went out about 4 months after we got it. Both units so far have had the same issues with locking up while you are watching something.For the price you can't beat this tv but if you can find something comparable for just a little more you may be better served with that due to the lockup issues.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Quality & Specifications for under $1000!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: TV came packaged so well, I didn't have any concern upon delivery. Set up was very simple and straight-forward as most TV's go. My set-up is very simple, one HDMI cable and the power cable (thanks to the Denon 1513BA A/V receiver I no longer need 4 HDMI cables going to the TV).We upgraded from a 60hz 1080p Dynex 42" to this Television and it is outstanding the increase in quality, weight, thickness and overall clarity in the picture. I was able to set the color just perfect to get the richest blacks without any over saturation. Happy birthday to me! Very big thank you to my wife and Pilot delivery for handling this TV with care upon delivery! Very much appreciated!

Reviews.Title: HUGE GREAT PRICE
Reviews.Author: jesus
Reviews.Content: Love it..huge screen have it since Feb. 2013.  very slim.i hate that it takes a few seconds to turn on around 3-5 sec.  also noticed that when i use the previos channel button. the sound doesnt work. so ill have to change channel up and down then it will work.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Sandra Petroff
Reviews.Content: We have enjoyed this TV. We were able to get it for less ordering it from here.  Highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Way surprised
Reviews.Author: James Mayfield
Reviews.Content: There are two types of hi def TVs. Those that look sharp and those that don't. When we watch Netflix even on non HD the picture is so much clear than our old hi def TV. This thing is easy to set up, really thin and the price is crazy for what you get.

Reviews.Title: love vizio!!!
Reviews.Author: N. Wright
Reviews.Content: this tv is wonderful, great picture..when you find out how to set it up properly. i only gave it four stars due to how difficult it is to connect to the internet. it also has to be pretty close to your wireless connection, unless you have dsl, it also doesnt stay. every time there is a storm, or the box is turned off, the internet settings reset. besides that i love it..and i LOVE vizio. this is our second vizio tv and i would not hesistate to buy another.

Reviews.Title: Nice flatscreen
Reviews.Author: C. L. Stalions
Reviews.Content: Haven't gotten the smart tv to recognize my wi fi at home but working on it.  Had the cable company come in and get it started - took about 10 minutes.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy!!!
Reviews.Author: Gerald Bohlke
Reviews.Content: After careful review of other TV's with similar requirements; I decided on the VIZIO TV and have not been sorry at all.  It is easy to set up and after reading the online recommendation on settings, it is more than made me a happy person.  Dollar for dollar - you cannot beat the price.  Of course i perchased the 3 yr warranty and also a surround sound system.  Sometimes I just set in awe with the picture i am looking at.

Reviews.Title: Skeptical at first, turned out to be an awesome TV
Reviews.Author: Maya Sharma
Reviews.Content: The reviews don't lie: this TV delivers, especially at the price range. It features a sharp picture, rich colors, and a fast menu interface. The brightness is perfect for a medium-light to low-light room, but it's a little dim for very bright rooms. The "smart TV" features are hard to navigate, but the keyboard remote is top notch.Main Pros:- killer price- super thin body- plentiful ports- great pic qualityMain Cons:- smart apps are hard to navigate, ugly.

Reviews.Title: Great Choice
Reviews.Author: Sam Sutton
Reviews.Content: Moving up from a 32 inch TV this was a perfect option, as it was in our price range, looks great in 1080p, and gaming on this TV is just wonderful.

Reviews.Title: GREAT TV
Reviews.Author: Mr. Sanchez
Reviews.Content: I am really impressed with this TV. And customer support is the best out there. I will be buying more vizio products just plain satisfied with everything.

Reviews.Title: Good TV for the money (so far 28 MAY13)
Reviews.Author: Kenneth R. Morris
Reviews.Content: First, this review is in two parts,  TV, then delivery fiasco.TV:  Great picture, sound, weight, size.  Remote rocks with the keyboard on the back, makes life easy for doing text entries for the varios services supplied by this "SMART" TV.  Many built in -apps do this TV justice.  not sure i'm up to facebooking with it, but, insant streaming Amazon Prime Video and Netflix,  woo hoo!!  Inputs are easy to get to and lots of them, have 2 consoles, a DVD, Tivo, and Laptop connected all labeled.  Can't gush much more on the product.  still wary with prior reviews talking about it going bad early, fingers crossed those chips are not in my device.Now,  about the Shipping.  Delivery made by 3rd party carrier. Delivery was made by one (1) person for a 60" TV.  Agent was not able to relocate existing TV without assistance from homeowner. Agent did not have necessary tools to complete delivery of TV (ie; screwdriver to attach stand to TV.) Unsat all around.  Additionally, TV was not configured for use by Agent, only initial setup complete to verify operability. It was left to the homeowner to complete connections that were originally in place on preexisting TV (ie: 2 HDMI cables)  Not happy with Agent or his company. Unhappy enough I might take business elsewhere for future large item purchases to ensure proper installing and configuration during Delivery.My 2 cents,  you milage may vary.

Reviews.Title: Excellent for the price!
Reviews.Author: Andres Rormoser
Reviews.Content: Excellent Image. Great Apps (Netflix, Pandora, Hulu, etc)The only fallback is that it doesn't have an app to control the tv from the phone by wifi.

Reviews.Title: Best TV For The Money!
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: Exceeded expectations; everything intuitive and easy to set up.  Picture is awesome.  Can't wait for next older Samsung to expire and will get another Vizio.

Reviews.Title: this is truly terrific
Reviews.Author: Leann Gilbreath
Reviews.Content: I had this mounted on my wall and I love it! The picture quality looks like you are standing watching it happen in real-life! Even old movies such as High Noon look wonderful.  I am so happy with my selection.  It will take some time to understand how to use all of the internet capabilities, but this tv is a gem to watch any movie or show.

Reviews.Title: Best for the price.
Reviews.Author: Free Press Sandra
Reviews.Content: This TV has had very high ratings and I have 2 other Vizio's in my home.  As 3D has not hit main stream yet and not expected to do so for the next 5 or so years I didn't need any thing other than this set.

Reviews.Title: Screen went out after 6 months
Reviews.Author: Angela Beth Anchia
Reviews.Content: The TV is a great price and I originally bought it using the strategy of purchase cheap, purchase often.  However, I was expecting not to have any issues until a couple years down the road.  I guess I expected better quality.  The Visio rep was very nice and they are sending me a new TV without argument.  However, they said it would take from 8-13 business days.  The earliest they'll deliver it is 13 business days so they are really pushing it!  I had to go buy a secondary TV b/c I didn't want to go 3 weeks without a TV and I only had one.  So, if you decide to buy it, make sure you have a secondary TV or include the purchase of a secondary TV into your purchase cost analysis.I agreed with other reviewers about the sound.  I purchased a soundbar.  The TV sound is OK, but sounds way better with additional equipment.  The picture is pretty good, but in dark action scenes the quality is really bad.

Reviews.Title: Quality TV for the price
Reviews.Author: James Dorsey
Reviews.Content: We were planning on getting the 70 inch Vizio but just could not justify the extra $600 dollars it would cost.  Our wall could have fit the 70 inch, but the 60 inch looks better in the space.  I did use the picture settings I found in a review on here and it is excellent.  Pictures on every channel look great when using HD signal.  Blu-ray DVD's are awesome.  Glad we bought this TV.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Andy Kimm
Reviews.Content: This is a great value for a big screen.  The display is beautiful, bright and vivid.  The "smart" features are very convenient, and the qwerty on the remote is a nice feature.  The speakers however, totally suck, especially for movies.  There are a number of audio presets and a custom sound setting, but you can only do so much with crappy speakers.  If you have a separate sound system, you're good to go, if not, your going to want to get one.  I connect a compact sound bar and it's fine.  Another flaw is that the rear inputs are difficult to access when it is wall-mounted.  I imagine this is a common problem with wall mounts.  The inputs should be moved to the bottom of the set, so you don't have to pull the screen away from the wall and fumble around semi-blindly behind it.  All things considered, you're not going to beat this TV at this price right now, but I'm sure there will be competition soon enough.

Reviews.Title: Best bang for the buck! (UPDATED)
Reviews.Author: Gi Man Kim
Reviews.Content: I've been a Vizio customer for about 6 years now.  I've had 2 Vizios in the past, One 47" and One 55" (3D).  They always had great picture (with some adjustments).  This one is really nice.  The bezel is barely there.  The set just looks sleek.  Pictures are amazing and the apps are nice features but I use PS3 for all the internet apps.Never had problems with Vizio units, so hopefully this will remain reliable as the other 2.(UPDATE - 1/22/2014)So I've had this TV for almost a year.  No problem whatsoever, until this weekend.  There appeared a 1 pixel thick vertical blue line in the middle of the screen and could not get rid of it.  Tried many tricks and still there it was.  Luckily, I was still within 1 year manufacturer warranty so Vizio is sending out a replacement after I sent them the copy of the receipt and few pictures of the TV showing the defect.  I haven't received the replacement yet but they are suppose to call this week to schedule a delivery time in which they will remove the old one and set up the new one.  I will update once that happens.  But so far, Vizio has been easy to deal with.

Reviews.Title: Recent purchase of 60 inch Vizio web ready TV
Reviews.Author: Richard C Nickeson
Reviews.Content: Nick bought this lovely Vizio smart 60 inch TV and had it mounted by those who delivered it to save this weak old man the task, then all the enjoyment of aw huge screen with very fine picture quality. Thanks Amazon and Vizio. I sold my 55 inch Vizio right away to make it a good trade.

Reviews.Title: VIZIO E601i-A3 60-inch 1080p 120Hz Razor LED Smart HDTV
Reviews.Author: Ken Webmaster About Facts Net
Reviews.Content: I can't begin to tell you how much I love this television. It has a nice picture, enough hook ups and runs about 150 apps, give or take a few.KenWebmasterAbout Facts Net

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Virgina Van Dam
Reviews.Content: Arrived in excellent condition and works great. Great tv for a lower price. I use the netflix button allot and it is very nice to have on my remote. The tv has a clear picture and nice graphics.

Reviews.Title: big fan
Reviews.Author: Jethro
Reviews.Content: I have seen quite a few Vizio TVs and I really like this one.  Good for well lit rooms.  Smart TV functions nice also.  Awesome value.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Tim Hampton
Reviews.Content: Television came in in great condition. Was easy to install. Crystal clear picture. The smart tv feature works great with my wifi. Wife and grand kids love it.

Reviews.Title: A great tv
Reviews.Author: Kurtanna
Reviews.Content: After reading about other tvs out there I settled on this one and I love it. Mounted it on my wall and loving every minute watching ig

Reviews.Title: Outstanding Television!!!
Reviews.Author: Terry Johnson
Reviews.Content: This tv has not let me down!!  Once you get some of the settings right, there's nothing that compares to it!!  Especially for the low cost!!

Reviews.Title: Good bang for yer buck
Reviews.Author: Jeff T. Roberts
Reviews.Content: It's not the sharpest image.  But, for a thousand bucks, it's hard to beat.  The brightness is good.  The colors are good.  The construction is solid.  The keyboard on the remote is pretty cool.  Pulling up twitter on a sidebar is novel.  Would recommend.

Reviews.Title: We Kinda Love it...
Reviews.Author: singin in the rain
Reviews.Content: We deliberated for such a long time when looking for a large sized tv and finally decided to go with this vizio.  We are very glad we did.  We've had it for a few months now, I didn't want to review it immediately, before knowing for sure if we like it.  It's a very nice set with good features for the price.  Picture is bright and clear and color is good.  It's in a pretty bright room, one wall is all windows and there is not glare on the set, even when the sun is on that side.  Viewing angle is quite good, the picture can be seen from a pretty pronounced side view although of course the picture is not perfect from a steep angle....still quite watchable.LOVE the size!I actually do like the qwerty remote a lot, it's easy to use, responsive, and backlit....although we usually use the directv remote when just watching tv.  The set does require a few adjustments to settings for the best picture but that's really an individual thing and most sets will require some little tweak here or there to suit individual preferences.We had an issue where an hd movie from amazon prime was not showing the whole shot....it seemed cut off on top and bottom, despite numerous tries to adjust settings.  I called vizio and the tech guy talked me through a few things and then said that the serial number on our set fell within the range where a bad "board" was used and offered a replacement tv for us.  Sets made with this defective "board" were known to lose picture completely so of course, I agreed and was grateful that he offered it.Have had the replacement set for about a week now and we still love it........haven't gone back to check a movie out on it yet, but at least now I know I have a set without the defective board in it.

Reviews.Title: Excellant Picture
Reviews.Author: steven strand
Reviews.Content: Other then the missing user manual, I am very pleased with the quality of the picture and sound quality ! Definitely worth the money spent.

Reviews.Title: Great TV so far
Reviews.Author: michter
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with this TV. It was easy to set up and has a great picture and the sound is pretty good too.

Reviews.Title: Awesome picture once tuned
Reviews.Author: Bo
Reviews.Content: These TV is very nice and the shipping was great I worked in the LTL shipping business for 17 yrs and this thing came unscratched not a mark on the carton and strapped to trailer wall.Good job

Reviews.Title: Works
Reviews.Author: BigUnLuke
Reviews.Content: This thing is good. A little slow to start up. Picture is good. Not as good as the Sony Bravia LCD it replaced. Sound is good. But, not as good as the Sony. Apps are a little limited. But, then again all TVs right now are. Would definitely recommend to a budget wise individual.

Reviews.Title: Great TV at a great price
Reviews.Author: David Van Couvering
Reviews.Content: Just got this today, it was very easy to set up, and have been very happy with it.  Being able to watch Amazon movies straight from the TV is a huge win, and the quality of the picture is just stunning.I used the settings provided on a previous review to adjust the picture, that made a big difference, before doing that the picture was a bit harsh and bright, now it's much more realistic.  Have already enjoyed Star Wars, Goldfinger is next.  Great birthday present to myself.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, "smart" part just okay
Reviews.Author: Barr G "BG"
