Reviews.Content: Pros:-great picture-game mode (reduces latency between inputs and the screen) works great-variety of input/outputs-looks great-awesome remote comes with qwerty keyboard on the back-netflix and amazon video app work great-had the tv for 5 months and no problems and it's on everyday for at least an hour and usually much more which says something about how much we like it. I feel like I am definitely getting my use out of it.Cons, these are all minor, but worth listing and keep this from getting 5 stars:-Small number of useful apps. I've only used the netflix app and youtube app. I bet vizio changes to a new App provider (right now its called VIA through Yahoo) because there are simply so few and I don't think anyone is really developing new apps...haven't seen a new one yet. IF/when this occurs this app system will be obsolete...-The youtube app is so basic I just use my computer instead. You can only search for videos, view your subscription feed and I think there is a popular/trending category that I've never used. The worst part is the search results can't be filtered. You search, get maybe 15-20 results and that's it. If the video isn't in the first 20 or so results then you can't get to it without research with a more specific title. You also can't change resolutions. It automatically uses 1080p which is annoying if you're running low on bandwidth. It won't let you just pause and buffer forever either. So if you can't stream 1080p then you can't really use the app. All that being said my friend watches youtube videos on it all the time...I can't stand it though.-no internet browser-Can't use separate audio input if the video is coming from HDMI. I have a DVI to HDMI cable that I wanted to use to connect between my computer and the TV. DVI doesn't have audio capabilities so for sending audio to the TV I wanted to just hook a 3.5mm audio cable from my speaker output on the computer into the TV. This can't be done even though the TV has a 3.5mm audio in. It assumes the audio will come from HDMI if you are using HDMI. It will only play audio from the 3.5mm audio jack if the video source selected is VGA.Other:-I have to set overscan on my PC to be able to use the whole screen. I think this is my specific computer though. Just be aware if your input has black borders around google how to set up overscan.-VIA apps are written in javascript/XML so if you are handy in these languages you have the potential to write an app, although you can't send it directly to your TV. I think Vizio would have to approve it/put it on the app store...-Sound is just average and there is not a lot of bass. It does get loud though if you have a noisy house.

Reviews.Title: great tv minus gitches
Reviews.Author: yeppy
Reviews.Content: I have had this TV for almost 5 months. It was delivered quickly and has a great picture. the volume isn't too impressive but I got a sound bar for that. how ever I have problems getting it to turn OFF on occasion. wether u try the remote or the actual buttons on the tv you can't do anything. so I have to pull every out to unplug it and plug it back in. then it works fine for a few weeks.

Reviews.Title: My VIZIO TV
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: Best TV I have ever owned. Picture clear and sharp. Works great with my laptop for watching movies streamed from the internet

Reviews.Title: So happy!
Reviews.Author: Shawna R. Bandow "Metal Angel"
Reviews.Content: I am having a great time with my 60 inch VIZIO. Everything works as suggested. Love the Internet apps. Realize though your YouTube app is limited in its search capabilities. Instead of hundreds of videos showing up on something common, you get a choice of 10 videos or less to pick from, and no way to filter the results. Another bad thing about the TV is the coaxial cable connecter. Mine is loose. It is extremely touchy. I'm just hoping it doesn't fall off, as what happened to another Sanyo TV (very old) that I own. I also use the TV for a laptop screen. Using HDMI is very touchy as well, the screen goes in and out (but that is due to a very cheaply made 15 foot HDMI cord). I also purchased a VGA cable for it. Using that, works great except the top left of the screen will flicker and wiggle some to the point where that's all you notice. Bad cables I say, not the TV. I love VIZIO so much that I just recenty purchased a VIZIO for my mother. She received it yesterday and is already in awe. I think these TVs are shipped out too fast and a lot of small things are overlooked, (like my coaxial cable connection), but other than that, the TV is a great buy. I was surprised to see that on a show like Mob Wives, there was a shot where they were inside one of the rich lady's home, and she owned a large VIZIO TV. I feel rich! :)

Reviews.Title: A bigger tv for a nice price
Reviews.Author: truth169
Reviews.Content: I wanted another tv but a bigger one for a price I can afford, this is it, I have internet on the tv! I love it and with all the reviews I was able to go to and set the picture quality, since I didn't know what setting was right, the reviews help with this. This is a nice set and it fit in my 51 inch space over the fireplace,all I did was move it here it there and wow there it is. I save a lot of money and it is worth it, it has nice sound but it is even better hook up to my bose and the children and I can watch all of the youtube we like, just make sure your modern set right and there it is.Vizo did it for me, and yes you do get support if needed. I recommend this tv

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I didn't want to stand in line for 5 hours on Thanksgiving for this television like others did. I do understand why they did though! I'm moving from a 46 inch Sony LCD to this beauty. This difference in quality is amazing! We watch quite a bit of Anime and other cartoons at my house and you can definitely tell a difference, and when I watched the Super Bowl, it almost felt like we were there! An added bonus was the apps that are already on the television and one bonus that I didn't know I was getting at the time was the remote. The opposite side of the remote has a full QWERTY keyboard which makes it much easier to pull up videos on Youtube and the other apps. Great buy!

Reviews.Title: Great quality for the price!
Reviews.Author: Ann
Reviews.Content: I love my new tv and I feel like I got a bargain. The apps are a plus! The HD quality is very good. The audio is good but sometimes it seems as though the background music overpowers the dialog in the movie or show. I would recommend this Vizio tv.

Reviews.Title: Another Lemon
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: Broke in less than 2 months. Same problem others described. Three weeks and a dozen phone calls to get a replacement. Delivery guy (who looked like the garage attendant from Ferris Beuler's Day off) yanked the TV out of the back of a beat up van where it was sliding around unprotected on the metal floor, had no idea how to box up the old set let alone unbox the new one, and had to borrow my tools to take the stand apart. Vizio handled this whole thing so badly it's almost comical.

Reviews.Title: Buy this T V
Reviews.Author: Al J Gilly
Reviews.Content: Great T V would recomend this T.V. to all. Right out of the box the T.V. is spectacular. Buy it.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: D H AZ
Reviews.Content: I bought 1 of these TVs for the house... They are great, easy to setup... The ONLY thing I have found wrong is that the TV freezes up once and a while..Then after they reset they have a loud bang from the speakers... I have (2) 32 in from the same company and it does the same thing. Its not a big deal but still happens... The HDMI spots and cable connect spots are in a bad spot in a way... The power cord is on the other side of the TV making it look really bad if you place the TV's on the wall... The APPS on the TV are awesome and love them... You have Amazon, Netflix, VuDu movie apps. You tube, Yahoo, twitter, facebook. You are able to connect to your computer via blue tooth and settings on your computer need to be set up for this... All the TVs I have great sound as well...

Reviews.Title: Huge and way better then I expected( for 10 months )
Reviews.Author: Scott H. Carroll
Reviews.Content: (4-17-13)I was really nervous that the TV would black out at some point or show up with some defects. I've owned in for 2 months now and it's amazing. I have messed with many of the settings for some things the smooth motion is awesome for most other it isn't. There are some great suggestions here in the reviews about which settings to try.It finally happened :( the screen went dark while the wife and I were watching Sleepy Hollow on Hulu, and Vizio is closed for the day hopefully I can get things resolved in the morning.(12-11-13)UpdateWent over the problem with Vizio about the screen blacking out. They took care of everything I'm getting my replacement TV here in a couple of weeks. I'm so very glad all this happened while still under warranty. Vizio Customer Support was wonderful!

Reviews.Title: great shipping
Reviews.Author: N. saindon
Reviews.Content: great setup from ceva with the white glove added my sounbar and im sitting in the theater ive always wanted.

Reviews.Title: Great product for the price
Reviews.Author: Chuck Grey
Reviews.Content: Got this for $899. Full HD SMART TV, 120 Hz motion, 4 HDMI inputs. It was pretty complete and at 60in slim frame its hard to beat at this price point. The additional plus is that it has a USB connection which can read most media files (music, video). I found that very convenient.The only con i see for the tv is that blacks were not as deep as some of the other TV's i have seen of this size. Some scenes of pitch black have some splotches of grayness and just lack that deep black uniformity. On brightly lit scenes however it makes up for that with great color vibrancy.I would recommend this if only for the real estate and features you get for less than a thousand bucks.

Reviews.Title: LOVE
Reviews.Author: Nancy
Reviews.Content: My husband wanted this TV and I was resistant but now it is on our wall I can't deny I am in love with it!

Reviews.Title: Great price & great product!!!
Reviews.Author: A. Marske
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love the TV!!!  Looks amazing, love the remote with the full keyboard on the back, love the netflix & youtube, love the price.  The delivery was very disappointing, however, but that isn't Vizio's issue, it's Amazon's issue.

Reviews.Title: Best TV I have owned!
Reviews.Author: A. Hudson "bisou bisou"
Reviews.Content: I bought this at a store that has BB as the initials. I like to buy bigger items like this in person so you can see it beforehand.I had owned a 55" LED TV that was only a few months old. It ended up having a bad display; it was not a Vizio and I had to return it to BB for another TV. At the time, I was just going to exchange it for the same TV but they did not have the same one in stock. They told me to look around to see if I liked anything else.I walked around the floor and found flaws with every TV I looked at. Not enough inputs, screen was too glossy, you name it, I was finding problems with all the TVs I was looking at. They had the 60" Vizio hidden to the side. I walked over and my mouth dropped. The picture was amazing! The size, perfect! The inputs, what I was looking for. I decided to go with it knowing it was a well known name.I have had it for awhile now and LOVE this TV! It did not weigh much at all and was very easy to set up. I did not need the Smart part of the TV, I own a Roku and also a Blu-Ray player that has all the applications built in. However, it is a lot easier to use the application directly from the TV. It has a built in wifi with an N band, connecting it to my network was less than a minute! I loved that this TV has 4 HDMI inputs. I also like that it has two audio outputs. The other TV that I returned for this one only had one. I don't know a person who buys a big TV without hooking it up to a surround system. I had an older system and with the two outputs am able to use my older sound system and am very pleased!The thing I like the most, it is big but yet compact! It is hard to describe. It really is a wonderful huge screen but yet looks compact and perfect on a TV stand. I was sold on the matte screen as opposed to a glossy one. It picture is very crisp and clear!My daughter is so happy I bought it and I am glad my other TV broke or I never would have exchanged it for this one. Vizio is a well known name, my father owns a Vizio and I have always admired his TV. This one is just incredible! I would recommend seeing it in person first and you will see what I mean. I don't think you can go wrong with this one.

Reviews.Title: Noticeable light leak issues, unfortunate deal-breaker for otherwise impressive TV
Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: I never write Amazon reviews, but after anxiously reading about and watching the price of this TV since last fall, I finally pulled the trigger and picked one up. While picture was sharp, black levels were impressive, and the design incredible slim and attractive, the "light leaks" from the edges during dark scenes were pretty distracting and made the product feel pretty janky. I'm guessing some people may not notice or care about this, but knowing I'll have the TV for at least 5 years and notice it every time, I returned it and picked up a Samsung UH60EH6000 for $100 more. It's a thicker design (as it's not edge lit) and the blacks aren't quite as dark, but it's full-array backlighting means there was no "light leak" and minimal "clouding".I'm guessing the Vizios are all slightly different, so you may have better luck, but it really sucks having to bring a 60" TV back to the store unless you have a friend with a large vehicle.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the Money
Reviews.Author: Robert Buchalski "umpprez"
Reviews.Content: Purchased this item in February and discovered that there were problems with one of the parts from a particular supplier to Vizio. Some TV's would go blank and would not recover. When I went to register the original TV, I was informed that Vizio was offering an extended warranty on my set or I could request a complete replacement. I chose the replacement and Vizio set up a new "White Glove" delivery. Vizio honored their commitment to provide a quality product and they stood 100% behind their warranty.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: Valerie Brzykcy
Reviews.Content: Great deal for the price.  Had a little issue with the remote not allowing me to use the VIA button, but great support helped me out with that piece!

Reviews.Title: Beautiful TV
Reviews.Author: Raymond Henley
Reviews.Content: Great TV that looks great in my living room.  Had ample number of ports for all of my devices.  Solid build quality and no dead pixels or other quality issues.  I haven't used the apps on it since I have a Roku so I can't comment on those.

Reviews.Title: Worked great and loved it, until video blew out
Reviews.Author: Kevin A. Dieterich
Reviews.Content: I bought this Visio back in early December for my living room.  My kids love Visio TV's, so that's what I went with. The TV was great for the price, with wireless and internet, etc...  In early March, we were watching the TV and all of a sudden the picture went black.  I tried power cycling and other, but no picture on start-up or anything.  I called Visio and told them what happened and they said it had failed right away and said they'd ship me a new TV and have people come to my house and swap the old one out for a new one. (sweet !)  I seems to me that they were very aware of this issue/component failure right away....maybe a known engineering defect ?  Regardless, my new one will arrive tomorrow (3 weeks for delivery) and if any issues, I'll update this post. (otherwise I won't) Regardless, overall great and responsive service from Visio and if I was buying again, I wouldn't pass on the E601i-A3.  I just hope the new one doesn't last a few months, which would make me change my mind. I can't wait to have it back, great TV overall.

Reviews.Title: WOW!!!
Reviews.Author: Dave	Hanzelko
Reviews.Content: Watching it as I'm writing this review. GREAT picture, no problems at all. Has GREAT color and looks O so great GREAT in my Man Cave...

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Donna Cox
Reviews.Content: Overall great tv, picture, sound are good.  It takes a while to come on and the channel numbers are small, but the rest of the features are great.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Jon
Reviews.Content: The best TV for the price!! Awesome picture, and great features, Netflix right on the TV is fast and easy! Fast delivery, arrived way ahead of schedule.

Reviews.Title: Love It!
Reviews.Author: Kristan
Reviews.Content: We love our new tv.  The picture is great and all the extras are great also.  The Netflix is definately a plus, we use this feature all the time. I would definately recommend this again.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!!
Reviews.Author: Jonathan Hyatt
Reviews.Content: For the price this is a really awesome tv.  Great remote with qwerty on back, makes things really simple.  Easy to navigate the smart tv functions and includes Amazon and Netflix.  Very fast internet connection too.  Slim, lightweight and great picture!!  The only thing I don't like and it may be user error is that my surround sound won't work with Amazon or Netflix.  Not sure why that is.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: KAA
Reviews.Content: I was a bit hesitant to order anything this big (and fragile) through the mail but Amazon clearly proved me wrong! It was offered with free "enhanced" delivery. I got a call within the estimated delivery date to make arrangements for a time of delivery, the delivery guy showed up right on time, brought it into my living room, unpacked it for me, waited for me to check it out, then offered to remove the carton materials. Great job!The TV is great! We love the "smart" features and use the streaming and DLNA capabilities constantly. Picture is very impressive, audio is OK but I did buy a Vizio sound bar within a week which was a nice improvement. Vizio has a help number that I used to answer a couple of questions...and here is the great part...a real (very helpful) human being answered the phone immediately! I cannot remember the last time I called any company without being put on hold for 20 minutes.I highly recommend this product, this (American) company, and I highly recommend Amazon as a supplier

Reviews.Title: Amazing TV!
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: We ordered this TV and love it. The picture is amazing. I would recommend this tv to anyone. You can't go wrong!

Reviews.Title: 1st Class TV and 1st Class Service
Reviews.Author: Domenick Tirabassi Jr
Reviews.Content: Everything went as stated .  TV arrived as promised.  In excellent condition. Delivery person was polite, efficient and a pleasure.  We couldn't try it out because Wisconsin weather prohibited starting it up until it had an opportunity to warm up, which took quite awhile. When we started it up it was beautiful and has been for the month or so since we have it.  Would highly recommend this Tv to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great tv and great price !! UPDATE......
Reviews.Author: D. Fischer
Reviews.Content: I was a little skeptical when hubby wanted the 60 incher......bigger isn't always better.  I've seen a lot of flat screens that were not great.  That said let me say WOW.....I love it, it's like being at the drive in.  Awesome picture and awesome price!!Well we haven't had the tv for a full 2 mos. and we were watching last night and the screen went blank, now we are in the process of contacting Vizio. We'll see how long this takes....they say it was caused by a faulty part from one of their suppliers. BUYER BEWARE!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: smart tv
Reviews.Author: willy
Reviews.Content: This is a very good buy on a very good tv. There is nothing bad that I could say about it. The packaging was great. Delivery was very quick. Would recommend buying this tv.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Bought from Amazon, screen was broke upon arrival and sent it back, to Amazon's credit they gave me a 50$ credit. My wife went to Walmart and bought this same model and made sure that she did not get one within the lot of bad serial numbers. Sent it up easily with my Sony 1020 Receiver and Dish Network System. Next morning cut it on and gave me a message it had updated the firmware to the newest version. Very happy so far. for the price hard to beat. The internet apps are great the way they are displayed on the screen and have no complaints so far. Will update this review as time goes on.

Reviews.Title: great value for the price
Reviews.Author: Randolph R
Reviews.Content: I was attracted to this tv by price, had to read reviews to learn about the brand and its reliability. I am happy with the features and picture quality.I recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding television!
Reviews.Author: Lee
Reviews.Content: My new television is outstanding. The whole experience with Amazon Prime was excellent too. First of all the tv was $20 more than at a major wholesaler, but with fast delivery and setup it really made up for the difference. The delivery was indeed 2 days after I pushed Buy on my computer, and the technician had it out of the box, on the stand, connected,  and working in 10 minutes.The picture is amazing, the Wifi easy to use, and the USB for my flashdrives fantastic. My only criticism is the sound. It seems like the background sounds or music overwhelm the main character. However the tv hooked up with one cable to my stereo and when that's on it's true theater quality surround sound. In all I'm really pleased

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Nathan Dodge
Reviews.Content: A little big for my space, but that is no fault of Vizio. Had to turn of the smooth motion because it made me want to throw up. With that off the TV is awesome.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic quality and perfect price
Reviews.Author: Jared
Reviews.Content: The price of the TV doesn't reflect the quality that you get. Would recommend to everyone. Fantastic product, great quality.

Reviews.Title: Great TV with one issue
Reviews.Author: Marc Maxwell "Maxwell777"
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV 3 months ago and have been really happy with it except for an occasional issue with it not turning off.  Yesterday the screen went completely black and I was unable to get the picture back.  I called Vizio Tech Support and after 20 mins of being on hold and explaining to the tech what the problem is, I was transferred to another person who told me that there is a problem with the video chip and they are starting to get calls exactly like mine.  To their credit, they are shipping a new TV at no cost.  The only real downside is that it is going to take 10-13 days for the TV to arrive.With that said, I have been very pleased with the purchase and even with Vizio's responsiveness in sending a replacement TV out.  Hopefully the chip issue has been resolved and there will be no further issues.

Reviews.Title: i love it it is great!!!
Reviews.Author: davy
Reviews.Content: I love it it is was a great buy. Still learning to use all the features but love the picture!!

Reviews.Title: GREAT TV
Reviews.Author: W. R. Chouinard "Bill"
Reviews.Content: GREAT PICTURE. SMART TV IS GREAT. SOUND IS OK BUT I HAVE A SOUND BAR. I COULDN'T BE HAPPIER WITH THIS DEAL

Reviews.Title: Great picture / poorinternet connection
Reviews.Author: kelmoren
Reviews.Content: Purchased 1st TV in December 2012.  The picture was great. Connected the TV to the VHT215 soundbar via HDMI, the TV controls the sound card volume and the sound is awsome.  However, the internet connection would not work.  A new Linksys router, E2500, was purchased at the end of December 2012, but still no connection.  Linksys customer service instructed to reserve a port for the TV and set the port up as a DMZ with no download filters.  Vizio customer service told me my signal was not strong eneough, even though signal strength showed 3-4 bars, and asked me to make a wired connection with the TV 30 feet away.  I thought there must be something wrong with the wireless card in the TV and returned it for replacement.  The TV was replaced in early February.  The new TV had a similar problem as the original.  Even with 3-4 bars in signal strength the TV would connect to the router, but not download.  There were 2 more calls to Vizio customer service.  Both representatives read from the same script and said the TV was not getting adequate signal strength even though the strength indicated 3-4.  This time I decided to bypass the TV's wireless card and purchased a Linksys WET610N wireless adapter.  The WET610N connected to the wireless network at the TV.  The TV connected to the adapter with an ethernet cable.  Everything connected and operated with speed to burn.  It took over 2 months, several calls/chats to customer service, and $120-$140 for a new wireless router and adapter; but finally my Vizio E601i-A3 works as it should have out of the box. Save yourself some time and buy a wireless adapter or a ROKU right frpm the start.  One other thing, I tried to post this review to the Vizio web site 3 weeks ago.  It has not been published on the site yet so take what you see on the site with a grain of salt.Pros:  Good Picture  Great Price  Slimline appearance  Keyboard on remote  With connection to VHT215 soundbar, the sound is awesome.Cons:  Internal internet card has limited wireless connectivity.

Reviews.Title: Vizio 60" Smart TV
Reviews.Author: nancy pierce
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love this TV! We owned a smaller Vizio and never had any problems so decided to stay ith the same brand! Everything about this TV is awesome ! Love the color! How thin it is ! The price is very right as well ! Highly recommend this !

Reviews.Title: best t.v for the price
Reviews.Author: dustin biron
Reviews.Content: very pleased with this t.v shipping was fast and the clarity is great.Have recommended this t.v to all my friends and family.People love to come watch sports at my house because of how clear my t.v is

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Jake
Reviews.Content: Nothing but impressed! It came earlier than promised. Set up was easy. Great picture quality. I love the keyboard on the remote, makes it easy to operate.

Reviews.Title: Carmen
Reviews.Author: Carmen
Reviews.Content: I really love my tv I am very happy for all the other thing the tv offer. For the prize I got all I want.

Reviews.Title: Very nice LED edge lit for the price.
Reviews.Author: Courtney Trautweiler
Reviews.Content: Bought this tv at Walmart, SN 47, right after Christmas knowing it might go on sale for Superbowl.  TV was warped about an inch or two but the picture and everything was awesome.  I am not a videophile but it took a while to get the settings where I like them.  Love photography (the a77 looks amazing on this set) so my preference is towards realism, not bright over saturated picture.  There are more than enough options for the average guy to get the picture just where they want it.  TV is in a bright room with a wall of windows 90 degrees, the glare resistance is nothing short of amazing.  One problem is color drop off at about 30 degrees.  If you have serious viewers at an angle, it may not be for you.  My wife and I sit nearly straight back in recliners at about 12 feet.Began reading about the tv on the AVS forum and found that my serial number had a problem with black screen of death.  Mine was fine but alas, the price dropped a hundred bucks.  So we called Walmart, talked to the manager and we could not get credited the money after three weeks so they suggested we bring it back and buy a new one.  This was very tempting but we looked on Amazon and it was 10 dollars cheaper plus of course free shipping and no sales tax.  With Walmart's 90 day return policy we could keep the Tv until we got Amazons.  So we did just that.  But we live in hillbilly land and the shipping company gave us the run around for three weeks and when we finally got in touch with them we found out it was serial number 47, same as we had and within the 38-48 under semi-recall.  So we call Amazon and complained and they treated us great.  Gave us a 50 buck credit and took it back.  Two weeks to get the credit so then we reordered, got the tv in two weeks, SN 50 and the tv is perfectly straight.My wife likes movies, I like news and sports.  We could not be happier for the price and despite the problems early on, Visio has stood by this tv.  I recommend it and Amazon as well.  Go to AVS for some great detailed info on this set.

Reviews.Title: Very good TV for the price
Reviews.Author: M. Ejaz
Reviews.Content: For the price I paid, this is an excellent Smart TV. Good picture quality, good standard plus downloadable apps via Yahoo app store, powerful WiFi. On the flip side, it takes about 10 seconds to start (wonder why?) Also, there is no web browser nor you can download one. I use over the air free channels and digital tuner is not very powerful.  Overall, its a good product that can be made better. If you are looking for a 60" Smart TV for under $1000, you can not go wrong with this one.

Reviews.Title: Best. TV. Ever.
Reviews.Author: Carol
Reviews.Content: I will only ever purchase Vizios from here on out.  We have a 29" in Master bedroom wall mounted, 32" in Living Room in entertainment center and this 60" in basement wall mounted.  Absolutely fabulous for movies, gaming, and general tv watching.  Love the options and settings it comes with.  The delivery via Amazon was top notch!  I picked the day/time I wanted and they were right on time.  He helped carry it down to the basement and got it all out of the pkg and inspected.  Gave us a ton of tips on how to install and wall mount.  He was so nice and helpful.  We installed an extra HDMI cable to the back and down the wall which we can plug into our lap top and watch things on the Internet on this huge screen clear as day.  So easy!

Reviews.Title: Great features at a great price
Reviews.Author: M. L. Alexander "Lee"
Reviews.Content: I have a very bright room with multiple windows and can't change that..  My previous set had a glossy face and the reflections were terrible.  It got so I would only use that TV at night.  So I specifically looked for matte finish large format TVs. I did a great deal of research and the Sharp and Vizio were practically the only two choices.I was initially skeptical of Vizio products until I read some reviews from professional publications.  One article called this Vizio set a "near reference" picture.  The comparably priced Sharp model did not get as good reviews, did not have any WiFi at all, and was several hundred dollars more expensive.  So I went with the Vizio and I am happy'In my well lit room, the picture is very bright and reflections are minimal.  They are still there, but they don't distract me like my old glossy screen.  Again... 9 windows.. 4ft wide and 6 ft tall... so I am impressed at how nice the picture is.  I don't even have it as bright or vivid as the picture will get... I have it toned down and it is still a great improvement.4 stars only because the sound is so thin... terrible, really.  But this is the same for all thin LED models.  I have external surround sound and it is wonderful.

Reviews.Title: great tv with a great price
Reviews.Author: ed castro
Reviews.Content: the service was fantastic the tv is awesome.  the service company unpacked and set up the tv all i had to do was plug it in i was very impressed..

Reviews.Title: DIED ON SUPER BOWL SUNDAY
Reviews.Author: Jaxdog
Reviews.Content: I bought the set from Amazon on Black Friday, received it about ten days later.  Delivery went fine.Set worked fine until the morning of the Super Bowl when the screen went dead but for the backlight.  I called Vizio Customer Service and had a CSR live on the line from Utah within 3 minutes. He had me try some resets for 2 minutes (I'd actually done them on my own before the call).  He said he thought it was the T Com board and said they would ship the part to the service company the next morning and I should hear from them by Friday.  On Wednesday (2 days early) the service co. called to set up a home repair the next day.  I was busy, so we set it up for the following day.Two repair people came and swapped out all three circuit boards that comprise the set -- apparently Vizio ships all the boards at once.  Turns out the CSR was right - it was the T Com board. The entire service call took about an hour.The set has worked fine since then.SO while I'm not thrilled that the set died -- my 6 year old Sharp, Dell and Polaroid HDTVs never had a problem -- I was pleased that Vizio's service was as fast, efficient and polite as it was.  Had I been available on that Thursday, the set would have been out of commission for four days.  Because of my schedule, it was out of service for five days.The set itself - with V 1.1.4 I was able to correct the lip sync issue with settings on my Sony AVR.  With V 1.1.5 no issues.  Yes, when the screen is booting up you can see splotchiness from the LED backlight but I've not seen it during any viewing of programs, including those with dark scenes.  The WiFi/Smart TV features have worked fine from the outset.I did buy a Square Trade warranty at Costco.  It wasn't until I got home and was able to see the actual contract that I found you get years 3-5 from ST if you buy at Costco.  If you buy elsewhere, ST covers years 2-4.  I lost a year of coverage even though I used my Costco Amex card to buy the set at Amazon.  Just a minor heads up for those who are looking at the ST warranty.

Reviews.Title: good but didnt quite meet expectations
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: The TV arrived and everything was there. Went to install the TV and the screws were hard to find to mount it. Once mounted I turned the TV on with the included remote and then the top of it stopped working. As in only the keyboard worked so I had to return it. When I returned it they told me about an issue they've had but i never experienced till that night. Haven't had it since but there are some quality issues they have. Good looking TV just technical stuff has some work to do.

Reviews.Title: horrible
Reviews.Author: afv6773312
Reviews.Content: i bought my first one right after xmas a month after i got it the picture went out. so i exchanged it and got a new one again. once again a month later the picture went out do not buy this product it is not worth the hassle!

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Dpie
Reviews.Content: Great picture and very good sound for a slim Led. I would recommend this TV to anyone looking for great quality at a good price.  ( = high value) .

Reviews.Title: Great TV, but get the extended warrenty!
Reviews.Author: Adam Linus Day
Reviews.Content: Got this from Costco for less than the Amazon price. I mounted it above the fireplace and it looks great when it works. Both HD video from Blu-ray, Xbox video, Netflix and upconverted SD look great as does online video if you attach a computer. Video games look awesome in single player and up to 4-player games are decent. The Apps are OK and the QWERTY keyboard is a good addition for passwords and searches. After 3.5 months the picture and then the sounds went out. I called Costco for a replacement which only took a week to arrive. I then called Square Trade to get the 5 year warrenty I forgot to get in the first place. They hassled me a bit, but agreed in the end and started the warrenty from the day the new TV was delivered. So, if this TV lasts 6 years I'll be happy... We'll see how long #2 lasts.

Reviews.Title: Good picture, good sound
Reviews.Author: Oscar
Reviews.Content: Had minor prolbme in coordinating the delivery, but the product itself has been fine.  Netflix has worked very well on tis product.  Other apps (you tube, hulu, vudu) have not functioned as well.  I do not know why.

Reviews.Title: Best value anywhere
Reviews.Author: epwh
Reviews.Content: The picture is fantastic.  We have it mounted on a wall across from a bank of windows.  There's some glare, but it's not terrible or unwatchable.  At night it's like sitting in front of a movie screen.  It's huge and beautiful.  The TV is nice and thin and looks great mounted on the wall.  Have only used the Smart features on the first day to test it out, but it was easy to set up and worked well.  Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: I love this TV
Reviews.Author: RalphTheExpert
Reviews.Content: I told my wife that I'm buying a 60" TV for my man cave.She told me I was nuts.She now loves to watch TV in my man cave.Cons:I will echo what other people have said: It takes a long time to boot up.  I wish it had PIP.  Connectors are a little difficult to get to.  You will need two people to mount this on a wall.Pros:Picture is wonderful.  I think the sound is wonderful.  The remote as an alphabetic keyboard on the reverse side (yay!).  Watching Netflix is really easy. The delivery service (two men) was wonderful.  I could not beat that and the price.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: Had the tv about a month so far with no problems.  Great picture and size, and price.  Can't go wrong for $888

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: kdelagrave
Reviews.Content: Only one downfall, no manual except get started manual comes with it.  Many buttons on remote we have NO idea what they are for, so we will have to see if we can find a book online.  Quick and easy setup and great picture.

Reviews.Title: Great TV at Very Good Price
Reviews.Author: Susan S
Reviews.Content: Sending for my wife.  I don't usually write reviews, but thought those new to very big TVs might run into my situation (old engineer, techie kids older and gone, up to me for setup).  This is an excellent TV.  Truly great picture and all my wife and I will want.  Setup is very quick and easy.  Just turn it on, click as you go, and the TV does the rest.  Ran an HDMI cable from the HD cable box to the TV and all was ready in minutes, did the setup, and all was set.  HD channels are a dream.  Like you are literally in the room with the characters.  Haven't been this amazed since my parents first got a color TV back in the 60s.We ran into a couple of issues that were not due to the TV and wanted to provide others with what we did.  Some of the channels we like to watch on cable do not have an HD equivalent.  Accessing the non-HD led to issues with the TV.  It would "stutter" a bit, flicking back and forth from good picture, black screen, audio cutting out, etc.  This was the biggest impulse buy we'd ever made, so I began to slump into my easy chair as Susan gave me "the look."Troubleshooting guide from web site indicated it was possibly trying to "pull" the picture up to 1080.  And the cable box was indicating non-HD at 480, way lower than 1080.  Comments on these reviews were excellent, and quickly found the S/N was not one with the bad chips, but caused me to remember to cut the info tag off the packaging that has p/n, s/n, etc.  Had forgotten to do that.Trying to isolate the issue (HDMI cable, cable box, TV), I got a filtered surge protector and better HDMI cable.  Still no joy on the issue.  Waited until all the appliances were off (frig, heater, etc) just to make sure no bad electrical signals.  Still no joy.Hooked up an old VCR/DVD unit to the "R/L/V" input on the TV, used the TV menu to change the input signal, played a DVD, and no issues at all.  So a big relief it wasn't a TV issue.Thinking (not so) fast, ran the R/L/V RCA cable from the TV to the cable box.  And, all of a sudden, non-HD channels are working with no issues.  Not as good as HD, but it's working.  And would support HD, but picture is much smaller (bought a 60" to look at 42," I think not).  Using the TV menu to move input back to HDMI, changed the cable box to a HD channel - and the TV is back to fantastic viewing.Sending this just to try to help others who (like me) tend to just call the tech support numbers when the kids aren't at the house.  Probably not the most elegant, but big relief to see the fantasic TV does not have an issue.  And will get a blu-ray player this week.This is a truly fantastic TV.  Must admit did not purchase thru Amazon (impulse buy at big box store), but know many others who have purchased large items such as this thru Amazon and never had an issue.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING!
Reviews.Author: R. Sanchez "Digital312"
Reviews.Content: Replaced a 4 year old 42" Vizio in my living room.  Delivery was prompt during the delivery window I had scheduled.  Mounted on the wall using a low profile wall mount and it looks amazing - the fact that the bezel is so thin and the tv is really thin as well makes it look like a picture handing on the wall.after playing with the settings I got the picture to look awesome!  I have it hooked up to a Yamaha soundbar via optical cable and have had ZERO lip sync issues on any of the inputs.I have the TV hooked up via CAT5 to my network and within minutes of finishing set up the TV automatically did a firmware update.  Netflix, Youtube, Amazon Video, and Pandora work flawlessly on it!  There is a mini app store to download new apps and you can actually remove the preinstalled apps you don't want cluttering your menu's.  High five to Vizio for allowing the preinstalled apps you don't want to be uninstalled.Extremely happy with my purchase!  Thank You Amazon and Vizio for such a pleasurable experience!!

Reviews.Title: Vizio 60 inch completes my living room
Reviews.Author: echo
Reviews.Content: This TV looks wonderful mounted in my living room. It's easy to set up and use (I never read the instructions). For the price, it is quite a value.

Reviews.Title: APPS are sub par~~~
Reviews.Author: Steven J. Hull
Reviews.Content: don't buy this for the apps. they use Yahoo.com. Not much free content. Lousy games. Takes 18 sec to load (probably the apps) Other than that if your buy this for the picture and value you'll hit  a homerun!!

Reviews.Title: Great...but maybe too good?
Reviews.Author: john
Reviews.Content: Great looking TV and a beautiful picture - but maybe it's just too good.  We don't watch sports or TV shows - we watch movies and I just hate the look that everything has - it's like a soap opera.  It just doesnt look appealing.  I've tried to adjust settings but it's a bit cumbersome.  We replaced a 50' plasma so maybe I just need to get used to LED.  We also play a lot of video games (like HALO) and they look amazing.  Sound is fine - you should not need a sound bar.  The built in WiFi is great - very fast.  The apps are good - I like the Netflix button but it's a bit cheesy as if it's more of an advertisement.  The qwerty keyboard is great for searching.  Also - this thing is super light.  Crazy that one person can move a 60' TV!

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Great quality TV.  Love the colors and sound and the ease of using Netflix and Amazon prime on it.  My 6-year old could use it without explanations from me.  It's like having a movie theater in your home.  Fantastic!

Reviews.Title: Beautiful picture
Reviews.Author: Thorleif H. Floystad "Henry"
Reviews.Content: Enjoying my new TV.  Picture is beautiful; sound a little muffeled but tolerable.  Expect long term use and enjoyment now.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Rebecca S Anderson
Reviews.Content: I was pleasantly surprised as this tv was not my first choice.  had bought a different tv which arrived damaged and was out of stock.  Our old tv was dead and we really needed a new one now.  So after "settling" for this one we are totally in love with it.

Reviews.Title: Really nice tv, but be careful of damage
Reviews.Author: Brandon
Reviews.Content: I was very excited to get a big screen smart tv, and had been looking for months for the right one. This tv caught my eye bc of the great price so i went with it. It is a very nice tv, but unfortunately does not have an internet browser. The first tv I received was unfortunately damaged which was a huge disappointment to me. The only reason I rated this 5 stars is the fact that amazon and vizio did everything they could to make sure I was happy. I received a new tv(3 weeks later) and it works fine. The way some of these products are treated in the warehouse and during shipping is a cause for concern. That is risk you have to take when getting a fragile item shipped to you.

Reviews.Title: SMART TV
Reviews.Author: LAVERNE CAMERON
Reviews.Content: GREAT PRODUCT , LOTS OF FEATURES , WE USE IT EVERYDAY AND USE THE APPS FOR NETFLIX , FACEBOOK , WEATHER, SPORTS , MARKETS AND UTUBE

Reviews.Title: 60" VIZIO TV
Reviews.Author: Peter Larsen
Reviews.Content: Works great, everything that I expected and more. The item was shipped promptley and arrived in great shape with no problems.

Reviews.Title: Mom gets the BIG picture
Reviews.Author: mikeffi
Reviews.Content: When my mom was in the market for a new TV screen I went looking for a good deal. Since I had earlier purchased the Vizio 55" for myself and was comfortable with the features and performance, I bought her the next size up.  She has been very happy with it and enjoys watching the streaming content as well as all the HD programming from her video provider.

Reviews.Title: Clear and crisp, with tons of features
Reviews.Author: Dane
Reviews.Content: Since the day the Amazon delivery driver opened the box, everything has been working beautifully. It fit on the wall rack we had for our 42" TV with no modifications, it plugged into my surround sound system, and we are good to go. At 60" the news readers on TV are life sized.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Louise Fore
Reviews.Content: This TV has a Great Picture. I like the smallness of the unit. The ease of the connecting the unit was much simpler than the last one we had.Great savings

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: The Duke of New York
Reviews.Content: I got this TV on Black Friday at Walmart and I love it.Pictures looks great, built in apps are easy and convenient. Qwerty keyboard on the back of the remote control is great for entering user names and passwords and searching. Only thing I don't like it the menu system forces you to scroll through 10+ apps along the bottom of the screen, but nobody's perfect.Highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: Disaster
Reviews.Author: Robert G Phaup
Reviews.Content: After only seven weeks the TV died.  LED back light went dead.  It took two weeks for Vizio to get a replacement to me.  Let's see how long this one lasts.

Reviews.Title: TV is what I expected
Reviews.Author: J. Paugh
Reviews.Content: I received the TV and once I got everything set up, I was very pleased with it.  Great picture, great apps, and very easy to get going.  The only complaint I have is with the remote control and that it's not backlit.  That should be an easy fix and I hope they take care of that with future releases.  Otherwise, the remote is great.Now, I did run into a problem less than a month of owning this.  My Netflix app locked up.  I would continue to get audio but the picture froze.  Nothing I could do could reset this, even unplugging it.  It reset on its own with a loud pop.  Then it would work again.  But now, the picture was degraded to the point that it made it difficult to watch.  So I called Vizio earlier today and was informed that my TV happened to have a known defect.  I was given two options: keep it and extend the warranty for another year and they would try to resolve the problem through tech support.  Or they would send me a new TV at no cost.  They would come in and set up the new TV, collect the old one, and be on their way.  I chose the second option.  Plus, they indicated they would work with Square Trade warranty to let them know that the exchange wouldn't affect the 4 year extended warranty I purchased.  So, I'm very happy with the way Vizio handled this and will heartily recommend this TV and this company to friends and family.And not to put too fine a point on it, the only reason this doesn't get 5 stars is because of the non-backlit remote control.  Even with the problem (which can happen with electronics), I'm very glad I made this purchase and would do so willingly again.

Reviews.Title: Best buy for the best price
Reviews.Author: Donald Wesley Smith
Reviews.Content: I received this television within 7 days...very fast. I love it no complaints whatsoever. Best 60 inch for the price no doubt about it.

Reviews.Title: WOW!  What a find!
Reviews.Author: anne
Reviews.Content: I was leery of buying scratch and dent/limited warranty, but financial constraints prevailed and I took the plunge and glad I did!  The only imperfection detected was some tearing of a box corner - tv itself was impeccable shape - as is its quality!  My dad, age 92 and legally blind, loves sports and the extra five inches (it replaced a 55 inch) was worth every cent!Amazon warehouse will definitely trump black friday/cyber monday sales for this consumer from now on!have had it for about a month - no problems, did buy a square trade warranty due to nerves, but probably won't need it!

Reviews.Title: the bizz
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: I love this tv dont think just buy.its thin its light its big it looks good in every aspect and its cheap why buy anything else

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: jamie
Reviews.Content: for $1000 this tv is awesome.  Great picture, smart features are also enhancing my life.  It also hooked up to my home media server wirelessly and plays all my stuff.  Great buy.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: ILoveShopping
Reviews.Content: Watching this tv would put your old tv to shame. Great crystal clear quality. If I could change one thing it would be the sound. Id give it a full deep rich sound but i take it that thats what surround sound is for.

Reviews.Title: Amazing TV
Reviews.Author: Rickyakafish
Reviews.Content: I have owned this product for 3 months now and could not be happier.  The contrast on this TV is better than my friends top of the line LG screen.  My friends brought their TV's over every Sunday during football season (I know it sounds like a pain, but its totally worth it)  With each screen receiving its own source, this TV was clearly the best picture.  I have never had a single problem with this TV and have moved it, like I said, dozens of times.  The only complaint I have is that the stand is really wobbly.  I have taken it apart many times to ensure that every bolt it tightened but it is still a bit wobbly.Other than that, best TV.  The best part is the price.  Nothing out there touches this TV's value.

Reviews.Title: WORKED GOOD FOR THREE WEEKS
Reviews.Author: RIVRAT
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV the end of Nov. 2012. The screen went black (no picture) Jan 28, 2013. Called Vizio same day talk to tect. after doing some test, they said that it needed to be replaced and they would send a new replacment. Today 2/19/2013 I'm still waiting. Got three calls from Manna shipping for delivery only to call the next day to move the drop off a week later. Now after almost three weeks we were notified the TV was lost. Called Vizio again said they would send another may take two weeks.  So at the time for $100. more I could have got it a Best Buy and returned it the same day with no hassle. I was happy with the TV .It had a great picture till it quit. But this ordeal with waiting for a replacment isn't worth the savings.it is now March 26th we've had the new one for 3 weeks so far things are working great.

Reviews.Title: great picture
Reviews.Author: Leland
Reviews.Content: This TV is highly recommended by CNET.  For the price, you can't beat the size and features.  People are coming over to my house just to watch TV.

Reviews.Title: love this
Reviews.Author: Get Rung
Reviews.Content: great TV for the money.  like the internet connection but the remote should be back lit and buttons not as "sticky"

Reviews.Title: Poor Build Quality
Reviews.Author: A. Gardner "argid"
Reviews.Content: The picture, when functioning correctly, is great.  However, the TV was warped, which led to really bad light bleeding.  It also had a line of "static" at the top of it on some channels.  We purchased it from Amazon Warehouse in "used-like new" condition.  Unfortunately, we had to send it back, and they will not replace it.  We got a great deal on it price-wise, but in the end, too many of these have been failing for me to justify another attempt.

Reviews.Title: This TV does NOT lag when playing games
Reviews.Author: Todd
Reviews.Content: I don't normally write reviews, but it looks like almost everyone online is complaining about this TV being lagging when playing games/using a computer with it.They are all wrong.  Each person who complained about that did not take the time to enable 'game mode', which removes the movie-smoothing technology that induces the lag they're complaining about.I repeat, this TV is not laggy when playing games, in any manor whatsoever, provided you have 'game mode' turned on.Regarding the rest of the TV:- Computer text looks great on it, no flicker or anything- Picture is bright- Some of the Smart TV features are gimmicky (e.g. Yahoo Weather, Yahoo News, etc.)- The YouTube and Amazon apps are good (when I compare them to other Smart TVs I've used)- The built-in speakers are lack-luster, but who the hell is buying a thin LED TV expecting great speakers?

Reviews.Title: Its a good TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Justin W Anderson "Justin Anderson"
Reviews.Content: I bought this used from amazon. They rated the condition to be "good, with some cosmetic blemishes". I haven't found a single scratch on it. It appears to be in "like new condition". I Think that anybody who is shopping for this size in this price point will be very happy. Although, I have noticed that smart apps stutter and freeze up so much so that I don't use them and just stick to my PS3 and Xbox.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Mandy Ulvestad
Reviews.Content: The TV is great, the picture has been good so far but we have started having pixeling issues and we aren't sure if it our Dish our the TV. But great quality for a great price!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: jschrauth
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with the purchase of this TV. I was not necessarily looking for a TV with apps because I have a standalone HTPC. Some of the apps work very well (Netflix), But some leave a little to be desired (Amazon instant video). This TV is a great deal for a 60 inch LED TV.

Reviews.Title: Super
Reviews.Author: rudy
Reviews.Content: Super deal and super quality. Picture is amazing. My in laws love it. I would buy it again and again

Reviews.Title: Overall a good tv
Reviews.Author: R. Art "weaselbiscuit"
Reviews.Content: This is overall a very good TV, I am happy with the look and picture quality especially at this price.  And you can't forget about the apps that Vizio tvs come with, they are just fantastic.  Some of the fastest best apps out there for netflix etc, however one complaint is that there is not an app for HBO GO, one of my favorite services.  I've also found that there is a slight motion blur effect on some different things.  This is unfortunate however at this price you cant have it all.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Randy K
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV I would highly recommend this product. We used to have a projection TV and have other LCD TV's and this is by far the best TV we have ever had. Delivery was exactly when they said it would be also. We couldn't ask for anything more!!

Reviews.Title: great tv for the money
Reviews.Author: ed kalagher
Reviews.Content: this tv is great, internet apps easy to use.only thing missing is ability to add usb keyboard and mouse. easy setup and very happy with picture

Reviews.Title: Vizio TV
Reviews.Author: Judy
Reviews.Content: Was very happy with all the features.  We went from a projection tv to this led flat screen and wondered why we waited so long to purchase it.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Miguel M Miranda
Reviews.Content: Great performance, First 60" that was under $1000, and I don't regret buying this TV, all of my friends thought I paid over $1500 for it.

Reviews.Title: Extremely Impressed
Reviews.Author: Justin Dunkin
Reviews.Content: I was a little hesitant to purchase a used tv but the price was too low to pass up.. I ordered the tv on a Thursday day and I was supposed to have it by the next Friday but I called and went and picked it up from the warehouse on Tuesday, I couldn't wait any longer.. As soon as I got back home I fired this thing up and after a few minor tweaks to the color and contrast it looks beautiful! I would recommend this product to anyone, what a steal!

Reviews.Title: Great Deal For The Price
Reviews.Author: S. Ruud
Reviews.Content: Saw this at Sam's club and almost bought it that night.  Instead came home and found it on Amazon for $10 more and no sales tax.  Wonderful delivery, they even offered to set it up for me.  The TV is only approx a inch thick and looks great hanging on our wall with a mounting kit that we also purchased off Amazon. How can yo go wrong?  LOVE AMAZON!!!

Reviews.Title: Best Deal for the Money
Reviews.Author: Bryan Fasulo
Reviews.Content: I must say that I am extremely satisfied with the produce.  I just got it yesterday, and....WOW!  Way more features then I would expect for a TV $300 more than I paid, let alone for under $900.That is all for now.  I will update after more usage.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Chris D Lundy
Reviews.Content: Great TV for the money. Setup is a breeze and the picture quality is top knotch. I would definitely recommend!

Reviews.Title: Great Bang for your Buck!
Reviews.Author: Ar ch
Reviews.Content: This television is the best value in the smart television market for under 1000 bucks you can bring home a wifi ready netflix enabled whopping 60" LED. I love the remote with easy access to apps and full keyboard! Lovin this tv!

Reviews.Title: VIZIO
Reviews.Author: Greetings
Reviews.Content: Never disappointed with Vizio, have for Vizio TVs in my house and the are all great TVs.  Highly recommend them to anyone looking for an outstanding tv.  This one was well worth the money I payed for it.  It commented to the internet with ease and If there is nothing on tv, then we can watch the Netflix or what ever we desire.  Great recommend to everyone sharp clear color and pictures

Reviews.Title: Cheapest 60" LED at the time
Reviews.Author: anon
Reviews.Content: I don't know if it's still that way, but when I bought this, it was the cheapest LED tv of this size.  I think the package said it would use $12 of electricity per year if you watch 5 hours per day.... pretty wild.  The picture is great, and the audio is fine, although I'm no audiophile so what do I know?  I'm sure the "Smart" part of it works fine as well, although I only use it for Netflix.

Reviews.Title: Viewing from side angle is not as clear as front view.
Reviews.Author: marcia ormes
Reviews.Content: sound is ok.. I added extra speakers to enhance sound. Over all it is a great tv for the price

Reviews.Title: It's Pretty Sweet
Reviews.Author: A Cool Guy
Reviews.Content: This TV looks amazing and you'll find yourself watching it just because of how vivid and bright HD looks on it. I can't tell you how many times I've watched "Finding Nemo" just because of how amazing it looks. I Highly recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: This the BEST thing we have ever bought on Amazon
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Friedhoff "jenn"
Reviews.Content: I got this on black friday and this was the most amazing thing i have ever bought on amazon...forget the amazon amazing deal .. the tv is un real has an awesomepicture and so many added features .. it brings you to a whole differant way of watching tv.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV!
Reviews.Author: Timothy Nelson
Reviews.Content: This TV has VERY GOOD contrast, SLIGHTLY over saturated colors(which I happen to like), motion is SMOOTH, and the Smart TV integration is very CONVENIENT and FAST. This is the best TV I have ever owned and I would gladly recommend it to anyone else.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Donna Weekes
Reviews.Content: This tv is perfect for the money.  I thought it came with internet access but it can only access the apps that come with it

Reviews.Title: Exceeded expectation
Reviews.Author: Michele
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up and the picture is outstanding.  Have only had a problem with setting up to my WIFI, but probably not a fault of the tv.

Reviews.Title: Great TV-- But be careful of certain Serial Numbers
Reviews.Author: Sumit
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV in November 2012, its a great TV for all the features it has , I love that it has built in APPS for Amazon and Netflix and tons of other ones as well.But in february, My Picture on the TV went blank, it still had sound, SO i called Amazon, to see if they would do something, but there 1 month warranty had expired, but I did learn that cetain serial numbers of this particular TV have this issue where the video chip malfunctions.Vizio has recognized this Problem, and on calling their special number for these TV's. they are sending a replacement.Hope that will work out better.I still would recommend this TV because I have compared it side by side to other TV's which are more expensive,the picture quality and sound and features, make this a good buy, dont forget the price.!

Reviews.Title: Not a bad buy
Reviews.Author: Todd
Reviews.Content: I still think LCD has a better picture than LED. BUT, this tv is nice. Not sure if its because its too far from my wireless router but youtube videos buffer (high quality ones). It says it has a full wirless signal but its showing a download speed of about 6-8 Mpbs when my laptop downloads (from same location) at 16-20 Mpbs. Possibly it might be better with an ethernet cable but at this point I haven't tried that. Remote is decent, would be better if it was backlit.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!!
Reviews.Author: Brian K Ash
Reviews.Content: Price was great, best i found anywhere!  Shipped quick.  Easy to set up, and picture is great.  Nice TV.  However the Smart TV apps, most are not available, or do not function.  Not sure why that is.  Have not delved into figuring that out yet.

Reviews.Title: nice TV
Reviews.Author: Dolores House
Reviews.Content: I really like the TVThe picture is great and it's a very clear picture. Amazon was very easy and pleasant to deal with. I have ordered a lot of merchandise from them and have been very satisfied with almost everything.It was also delivered in a very timely manner and the Guy's that delivered it were very courteous and helpful.If Iever need another one I will definitely buy from Amozon again. Oh and the price was great!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Drawmonster
Reviews.Content: Beautiful picture and just an overall beautiful TV.  Especially for the price I got it for on Black Friday.  The built in apps, like Amazon Prime Video, are very nice.

Reviews.Title: You ask me to
Reviews.Author: Lotte Shoucair
Reviews.Content: Nice picture quality and color Audio is clear etc.I just wish I had somebody who could install the rest of the option availableand how to operate it.

Reviews.Title: this is the older model that walmart blew out on black friday
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey A. Gold "broadcasting nut"
Reviews.Content: This would be a good buy but walmart blew this older model out on black friday at 688 with unlimited supply that it hard to buy it at this price. If you call vizio they will tell you the newer unit will be out in march. This one is discontinued.

Reviews.Title: Netflix works well too
Reviews.Author: DavidNC
Reviews.Content: Overall I have no complaints about this TV, picture is great, sound is OK and smart tv apps is OK. Netflix works well and the remote is a nice touch. 3 year old can finally do netflix all on her own now, thanks to the apps being integrated into the TV and only one remote with easy color coded buttons.

Reviews.Title: Good deal, all around!
Reviews.Author: Lawrence Nielson
Reviews.Content: I give this product all five stars - it was everything I expected from the VIZIO product, came without incident, when they SAID it would and without damage. I paid a better than fair price for the product as well.

Reviews.Title: Pretty Good
Reviews.Author: Philip L. Stauber "Larry"
Reviews.Content: I think this TV pretty much lives up to its claims. The HD displays are quite sharp and clear. It's especially a pleasure to watch sports events. The Smart TV part of it is nice to have, but has a way to go before it's as "smart" as I would like.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Matt Wyatt
Reviews.Content: great picture. could not ask for more for the money, very satisfied with picture quality. customer support was excellent also.

Reviews.Title: Love this
Reviews.Author: Mike Murrian
Reviews.Content: Very good TV. Image is stunning and really enjoy the built in Netflix access. We have been wearing out this feature. Really happy with purchase.

Reviews.Title: Sound issues, but fantastic picture
Reviews.Author: Jeremiah Bascue
Reviews.Content: Pros:- Amazing picture, easy to calibrate- Light weight, easy to mount on wall- Thin bezel looks professional- Low reflection even in brightly lit room (my living room has a ton of natural light)Cons:- Sound quality is pretty bad- Sound doesn't sync with picture sometimes. It's a very annoying bug that many people experienced. Sometimes the sound is off by 2-3 seconds and to correct it the channel or input has to be changed. There are some work arounds if you google but those haven't worked for me.- Weak wifi. No other devices in the same room have any issue picking up the wifi signal in my house but this unit would time out trying to just get to Netflix main menu. I bought a 100' ethernet cable ($70) and ran it through the basement from my tv to the router to get internet connectivity. Kinda lame but it is very fast now at least.I was hoping I could get rid of my 5.1 home theater setup and have a cleaner application but I just can't deal with the bad sound of this tv unfortunately. I'm either going to buy a sound bar or go back to using a receiver with a 2.1 setup.Aside from the sound and wifi issues, this TV is pretty amazing and I'm pleased with the quality of the unit for the price I paid.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Sporty
Reviews.Content: This TV has a beautiful picture. I had a 50in projection tv before and I thought it was nice. There is NO comparison to the clarity of this tv. My whole family loves watching movies together and this was a great addition.

Reviews.Title: I Like it
Reviews.Author: Robert S. Dillon
Reviews.Content: Apps there are not that many feel like I wasted a few hundred to get them and there isnt much there. No time display on tv which I do not like and I had to spend another $50 buying connections to hook up all my other stuff for the TV. It's no Samsung but I like it.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Irene Husman
Reviews.Content: Great picture! The color is off and Vizeo tech couldn't help. I need to call a technician to adjust color.

Reviews.Title: great value - perfect
Reviews.Author: Jay Eshleman
Reviews.Content: THis TV is great.  no issues, and dont expect to have any.  I have 4 TV's all Vizio, non have ever had a problem.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Chris S
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV about one month after it was released for sale on fairly strong early reviews from users and product review teams alike. Overall, I am extremely satisfied with the product as it meets all of my needs.I initially had some issues with audio lagging behind video on certain channels, but either overnight software updates or changing my box to a newer model through my cable company seems to have fixed this. Aside from that specific issue, I've only had issues with the Netflix app. I suspect this to be an app problem and not a TV problem so I am basically just waiting for them to update it at some point. Occasionally, I'll be watching a show and the picture will freeze. The only way to fix this is by unplugging the TV and then restarting it. It's a bit of an annoyance but certainly not a deal breaker. I have never had an issue with the amazon app or with general TV watching.For the price, this TV really can't be beat. Are there better TVs out there? I don't doubt it...but they'll have a hard time coming in under 4-figures for sure.

Reviews.Title: Good product for the price
Reviews.Author: David M. Hoffman
Reviews.Content: I set it up using specs I found on a web site that does this kind of thing just to see if it was better than what I came up with. They were better picture wise. My problem (besides old ears) is that the sound is strange to me. I hear the background music and sounds lounder than the speech. Same on the Samsung in the bedroom. But then I guess that's why they make sound bars for these kind of TV's. Quality of the picture is very good and I have bough a stereo to hook up to it (not done yet). I liked the TV so much do to what you get for the buck I bought another one because the wife wants a bigger one in the bedroom.

Reviews.Title: I love this tv!
Reviews.Author: Kevin M. McNamara "kevinmack1111"
Reviews.Content: there is nothing i do not like! I love this tv. all the apps are great. Amazon and netflix right on the remote scince i use both so much I am happy about that. also turn over the remote and its a key board. Smart TV's are very exspensive so i got a great deal.the delivery is what sealed the deal for me. Amazon has someon deliver the tv and takes it out of the box and plugs it in to make sure it works and thats good for everyone.

Reviews.Title: Jen in Tx
Reviews.Author: Jennifer
Reviews.Content: What a great TV!! It was delivered exactly on time and the delivery guys were very friendly. It went up on our wall without any problems. Set up was easy and we were watching it within 30 min of taking it out of the box. We love it!

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT TV
Reviews.Author: Nancy Mattia
Reviews.Content: Excellent TV.  Superb pix & sound.  Though it is going to take me forever to learn to use the remote.  But that on me.  I recommend this TV highly.

Reviews.Title: nice tv
Reviews.Author: scott a lower
Reviews.Content: fast delivery and a good picture too .the led makes a big difference .the profile is nice quit a bit thinner than other tv's

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: tonysnow@yahoo.com
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up. Works great. I would recommend you purshase this television.  It is a good deal, not too expensive and the quality is great.

Reviews.Title: Vizio 60" LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: CedarCreek
Reviews.Content: When we received the TV I thought it was over kill but quickly decided it's a great size. We are enjoying the football games as well as other veiwing. We aren't dissapointed we didn't get the wrong size with a 60".

Reviews.Title: Awesome tv
Reviews.Author: SETH
Reviews.Content: Bought this tv for break room at work, and the guys love it.  There is no cable or satellite And the picture is 1080.  The guys couldn't believe the picture.  This tv has Netflix also.  Worth every penny.i highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Vizio 60 Inch
Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: I bought the TV for Christmas and so far so good! Picture is great! I saw some reviews regarding the sound quality and I was pleasantly surprised! For the price you cant beat it!

Reviews.Title: Great Buy!
Reviews.Author: GBunn
Reviews.Content: All I can say is "WOW".  I purchased this set after the holiday and needless to say I am very impressed with the my purchase.  About a year ago I purchased a 47" set and at the time thought it was the cream of the crop, but boy the picture quality on this set is superior to my earlier model.  If there is a negative I would say the sound quality could be much better.  In reading reviews of other LED models this could probably be echoed across the board.  Overall, a great product for the money.

Reviews.Title: Well worth the price.
Reviews.Author: Steven A Hanson
Reviews.Content: The picture on this set is great and set-up was a breeze. My only problem has been with the sound lip sinc. Still working on that and cannot say at this time if solved. Time will tell. Would still buy this set at this price.

Reviews.Title: VIZIO is the Cat's Meow!
Reviews.Author: Michael Bonacci
Reviews.Content: I bought this 60 inch hi def tv based on consumers' reviews and Consumer Report. We are not disappointed. The picture is ultra sharp, almost like watching 3D in some cases. The colors are vibrant, and realistic. Installation was easy, but I have to call Vizio to find out why my Wi doesn't work as attached.

Reviews.Title: Great for the Price
Reviews.Author: Leo T
Reviews.Content: Although I do see some refresh rate distortions on some movies, which were mentioned by others. However, I feel that for the money, this is a quality tv set worth the investment and am completely satisfied with its performance.  Although I haven't really utilized the full capacities of this set (online, blu ray, etc).

Reviews.Title: Awesome Picture and a Smart TV
Reviews.Author: Andrew Ragain
Reviews.Content: The picture is amazing, the wi-fi that comes with the TV is great allowing Netflix to stream and internet capabilities. My favorite XMAS present in years!

Reviews.Title: good TV for price
Reviews.Author: JJinNM
Reviews.Content: This is a pretty good TV for the price and the picture seems reasonable.The internet connection doesn't work as described.Amazon support was helpful with the problem and followup but the bottom line is that we bought this unit in part for the internet access and we can't use the internet connection.Internet details - running a non-broadcasting, WEP wireless network. TV can't find the network even when I give the name. All other devices on network are fine, Kindle, tablet, Windows7, Vista, XP, blu-ray with internet. If I broadcast the SID the TV can find it but when the SID is not broadcast there is no internet access in spite of the Vizio description for a non-broadcasting SID.Update - Feb 2013 - bought a new wireless router and TV now works with non-broadcasting network. Picture quality seems comparable to our Samsung of the same size. Nice unit and a good value

Reviews.Title: Vizio
Reviews.Author: Patricia
Reviews.Content: I am loving my Vizio T.V.  It has a beautiful clear picture. It was easy to set up and I will enjoy for years to come.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Josephine E. Bateson "Jo"
Reviews.Content: Just what we wanted a large screen, good picture. Easy to set up and we have had no problems with it at all.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding TV
Reviews.Author: Larry L. Miller
Reviews.Content: Initially I didn't include Vizio in my search, but based upon reviews and recommendations started researching it more and went ahead and purchased it.  Had it about 3 weeks now and couldn't be happier. This would be outstanding performance for a TV costing hundreds more, but for the price is a tough to beat.  Paid under $1,000 and in my opinion, compares to some sets costing close to twice that. Very happy so far.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Chamroeun Men
Reviews.Content: Vizio customer service was above and beyond expectation. I would recommend Vizio products to friends and family. Great product with great service.

Reviews.Title: Vizio E601i-A3 69 inch
Reviews.Author: Ronald Whiting
Reviews.Content: This TV has a beautiful picture. I didnt like the cheesy manuel that came with the unit. When you pay good money for a product there should be a well written manuel on the function of the product.However I would recommend it to my friends.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV for the price
Reviews.Author: westurner "wMaurice"
Reviews.Content: So I've hada few Vizio televisions in my time. Started out with my 37" and then my 42" and now my 60" and all have had their positives and negatives.CONS:* In this case, this TV's smart capabilities is due to it's inclusion of the Yahoo! Connected TV apps, which does not work with the Android app by the same name. Those apps should connect with the TVs that support Yahoo! Connected TVs. This one does not. Support says that they will let me know when it does... yeah right!* The Apps seem a bit buggy or laggy and slow. I suppose it's due to the platform, Yahoo! Connected TVs app. In nay case, the apps are a bit sluggish. They function appropriately.* Wish it worked with the app so I could control with my tablet or phone.* Base seems a bit wobblyPROS:* Other than that, the blacks are very deep, so contrast is amazing.* Four HDML ports* WiFi* Netflix* Easy to setup* 2" thick with thin edges!!!! Amazing!* Beautiful colors (I've yet to test a true HD like blue ray)

Reviews.Title: Great tv.
Reviews.Author: Mikemosun
Reviews.Content: Bought this tv to replace a rear projection tv I bought 12 yrs ago. The picture is stunning,my only complaint is the sound isn't that great,but nothing that a sound bar can't fix. I have had mine for a week now and love it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: BDK6017
Reviews.Content: Great picture, great features and easy to setup. Love the thin frame and stand. Would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a nice LED HDTV.

Reviews.Title: Nice tv
Reviews.Author: Kimberly J Acciardo
Reviews.Content: I recieved this tv in the beginning of December and I'm very happy with it. great tv for a great price!

Reviews.Title: excellent FIVE STARS
Reviews.Author: boleslaw bryj
Reviews.Content: very good !!!excellent!!! price was good!!! fantastic gift for  Christmas and New Year 2013. Thank you!!!!We are very happy!!!!!boleslaw  bryj and family

Reviews.Title: Wonderful upgrade
Reviews.Author: 2thumbedEbert
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV to replace a 46" Samsung that was having display problems. This TV is huge and I love it! I also am amazed at how thin it is. The picture needed a lot of tweaking out of the box but now it looks great. I often have the overhead lights on when watching TV and the matte finish on the screen does a great job of preventing glare.The remote is a nice addition to this TV. It's easy to use and the qwerty keyboard on the back let's me quickly punch in Amazon streaming searches on the built-in app. I recently received a universal remote as a gift and I'm guiltily hoping that it won't be compatible with this TV, just so I have an excuse to keep using this remote :)The sound seemed OK when I first plugged in this TV but I always use my receiver and can't really comment on this aspect.Overall, I have no regrets with this purchase and I would highly recommend this TV to anyone looking for a great set that won't break the bank.

Reviews.Title: Awesome set for the price
Reviews.Author: william
Reviews.Content: This tv is better than expected! Awesome picture and great internet apps. Only drawback for me is it does not have a internet browser. Outside of that I highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: A bit premature
Reviews.Author: robko
Reviews.Content: The 60 inch Vizio has an excellent picture and its slim appearance provides a look that does not detract from a room's decor.The above statement was premature; right after I first put my Vizio into service.
